name: Alexandria Williams- Lee
text: Great care and customer service

name: Carolyn Cason
text: Went in for cataract surgery and Dr Lee put the wrong Len in. Now I’m so nearsighted in this eye I was better off with the cataract. I do not recommend this dr. He told me things like this just happen. He should ha e looked at my record.

name: Ellen Jones
text: The receptionist is rude as hell especially to people of color!

name: Jeremy Alexander
text: Dr. Ray Cain did my grandmother's cataract surgery and my great aunts too. He also implanted lenses in the eyes of my grandfather and did a great job! I would recommend him to anyone needing the specialty treatment that he provides!

name: Joy Laws
text: I had Lasix last week and I am very pleased with the experience and results. Dr. Lee is the best!

name: Katrina williams
text: What a quack. He ruined my sister's eye forever. Her eye cannot be fixed! He also ruined my mother's eye. It cannot be fixed! People beware of Dr. Lee. Also, you have to sign a form before surgery that you can't sue him if he destroys your eyes. He needs to be sued.

name: Serena Dotson
text: Awesome Dr...my right eye I had just shadow vision since I was 7...After surgery I can see 20/30..out of it...thank you Dr Lee

name: Stephanie
text: Dr. Lee & his entire staff are AWESOME 😎

name: Karen Curran
text: Best place to get eye exam and glasses.  The staff made my visit enjoyable!

name: Paula Turner
text:
They need to have a a bigger and better selection of glasses
I was told to go to denny vision but I went to my home town place wasn't really happy with the glasses that I got but I didn't have alot of choices.
The eye doctor is a very sweet and concerned lady. I really like her.
Thank you so much Tammy Wallace

name: Harry Jarvis
text: Everyone at EyeCare is extremely knowledgeable and very efficient. Dr Tammy explains everything.

name: Sweet T's Nerdiness
text: Absolutely amazing experience! Every member of the staff was kind and welcoming. Any questions I asked during my appointment was answered with a wealth of knowledge and passion for what they do. I was told what to expect and why they were doing each step of my eye exam, that alone creates a great atmosphere. In all I would highly recommend OD Tammy Wallace and her staff! Thank you

name: Lynn Gilley
text: The nurse and doctor were great. Super polite and informative. But.... I went in there after being told twice that I would only have to pay my $20 copay up front. Upon checking in, i was told it would be $144. When checking out, it had changed again to $203! I'm on a fixed income....so much for paying my power bill this month.... Had I known this, I would have cancelled. Who needs electricity and heat, right?

resp.text: Lynn, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry about this billing issue -- this is definitely not the experience we want our patients to have. I'd like to look into what happened -- could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: Haley Pyle
text: Wonderful experience! Everyone there was so nice, and Dr. Wallace did a great job of explaining everything to me. 10 out of 10 recommend and do not think I will ever go anywhere else as long as they are in Ozark.

name: Shandria Johnson
text: Absolutely AMAZING! I ripped my last contact this morning and they squeezed me in when everyone else was booked out for at least a month. Every single staff is extremely friendly and comforting. I was given all the knowledge I needed up front to make decisions. They repeated anything that I didn’t understand. They made sure I was happy and given all of my options. I’m new to the area but I highly recommend them! If their service was this amazing during a pandemic I can’t only imagine how great it is normally. Thank you ladies!

name: Linda Tiedeman
text: Great employees. The exam is very thorough and you feel they truly care about your eyesight.

name: Brian Shinholster
text: I’ve been totally impressed with the professionalism That was displayed Throughout  My visit. They were courteous as well as knowledgeable about there product, I will definitely give them two thumbs up or 10 out of 10!

name: Darrell Langford
text: This was my first visit, and I was thoroughly impressed.  The staff was very courteous and professional. Left the facility feeling I had received the best care possible.

name: Willie Faniel
text: Once I did my eye exam, Dr. Wallace explained everything to me in detail, she really understood what I was going through. That really put my mind at ease. Very professional & understanding.  Thanks guys 👊

name: Lorianne Hairston
text: It was great at this Eyecare Dr. APPOINTMENT NO LONG WAIT AND EVERY ONE WAS NICE AND GREAT AND TOOK THEIR TIME TO EXPLAIN WHEN I HAD A QUESTION YES MY KIND OF PLACE NO LONG WAIT.

name: Angie Perreault
text: Love Dr. Wallace... she is kind and extremely thorough. I always have a pleasant experience when I visit and leave with a good peace of mind. The staff are very friendly as well... highly recommend!

name: Lexi Covel
text:
I was told back in early January that my glasses would arrive at the Enterprise location, and that they would call me whenever they arrive (they said it would take only a couple of weeks).
This is late March. I’m very disappointed and I’ll never waste my time with FEC EVER again.

resp.text: Lexi, I'm Cassie. I'm sorry about the delays with your glasses. I'd like to look into what's happening with them. Could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: Barbara Woodall
text: I would recommend Dr Tammy to all my family and friends. She is an extremely through and great patient bedside manner. The staff is Awesome

name: Patsy Corriveau
text: I always have a welcoming experience when I go to see Dr. Wallace. Her staff are friendly and caring along with her. They make you feel comfortable and ensure your safety is being kept within the guidelines. I would recommend Dr. Tammy and her friendly, professional staff to anyone who needs an Eye appointment..

name: Marty Parson
text: Thought it was little pricey , even with vsp insurance.  But over all Tammy is awesome.  She's the main reason I go there.  I'll pay extra for good service.  Assistants were awesome also.

name: Preston Maund
text: Overall very good experience. My tech was Mikaela and she was very proficient and professional. Dr. Wallace is awesome! And thanks to Jessica, I was able to find a great pair of glasses that I was very pleased with.

name: Myra Morrill
text: Excellent care and made me very welcome for my first time there.

name: Vonda Fite
text: Dr Wallace and her entire staff are very friendly, polite and professional. They will make sure everything is accurate and precise whether your being fitted for lenses or glasses.

name: Michael Marchman
text: First time visit.  Was very impressed with the experience.  Dr. Wallace was very pleasant and explained the exam thoroughly.  The assistants, each provided a separate service,  were pleasant and detailed in their work.   The office was very neat and orderly with what appeared to be the most up to date equipment.  There were also oversized chairs for those of us in an oversize class.  Very nice selections of frames. The entire staff presented professional appearances.  They were very personable and treated you as a long time client. Based on my first visit, I would highly recommend Dr. Wallace and her staff.

resp.text: Michael, we are so glad you decided to give our office a try! Thank you so much for your thorough review of our office and our team. We really appreciate your review!

name: Phenishial Glenn
text: Great job 👍 keep up the good work STAFF!

name: Karen Rae Gardner
text: Even as crazy everything is with the pandemic right now the staff was absolutely awesome. They were kind, caring, and professional. They also have an great selection of frames. If you need new glasses or contacts this is the place to be!

resp.text: We are so glad to hear this Karen - we know getting out can be a little bit overwhelming at this time so we want to make sure we keep you safe without comprising your eye care and experience.

name: Victor Ingram
text:
Overpriced for an exam definitely wouldn't recommend them if I was going blind and my seeing eye dog would go blind as well would rather take my chances with the blind seeing eye dog.
$180 for a contact lens exam and they do not even accept all the insurance that is provided not to mention I'm a federal employee and they don't accept the insurance that I pay for definitely will not be visiting again time wasted and not willing to pay $180 just for a contact lens exam

name: Carolyn Mahone
text: Very friendly atmosphere. Staff and Doctor Wallace are great. I would highly recommend.

name: Vicki Shehane
text: Very professional and efficient. Thoroughly explained before and after exam procedures. Have been looking for a new eye doctor and will be joining their patient list. Would highly recommend them.

name: Tracy Walsh
text: Fast and efficient service today at Family Eye Center. I was able to get back to my job in under an hour. Awesome!!

name: Montana Long
text: I am very pleased with my experience at Family Eye and Laser! The staff was amazing. They were very informative and helpful. Erin Jones made me feel right at home. She helped explain things I've never understood about my eyes. Jessica Garrett was very helpful with finding the glasses that I actually love. I would recommend this eye center over any other place.

resp.text: Ashley, Thanks for the incredible review and for giving our team a nice shout out! We appreciate your review!

name: martha beach
text: Everyone was very friendly and helpful and got me back before my appointment

name: Brian Young
text:
I rather enjoyed my visit today, and how often can you say that about going to a clinic? From the first person to the last, they were so kind, professional, and knowledgeable.
Stand outs were Kimberly, Jessica, and of course Lisa.
And my goodness, do they all look beautiful too!

resp.text: Brian, thank you so much for your kind words about our team and the ladies loved your complement! ; )

name: Jeep Bruce Listening
text: Been a customer since Feb 2017 ...excellent service and been back 4 times now, most outstanding customer service. THE Doc was so calm and explained things that even a 5 year old could understand. I came here because l saw the same when l brought my Grandson here 5 years ago....cannot find better optometry clinic for kids or adults!!!

name: Susan Mathis
text: Awesome experience will go back yearly. Great prices. Friendly staff.they go extra mile for senior citizens. Dr.Tammy is a blessing.Highly recommend Dr.Tammy.

name: Lisa Willis
text: Would never go to this eye clinic ever again!!!😡😡 These people ripped me off big time!!! I paid 120, even after they did my insurance! I usually don’t pay that for exam.  The only reason why I went here was because I was in need to get my eyes checked and after quarantine, everything was booked! the doc I usually go to is dr MacArthur’s office! At least I paid 45 after insurance along with contacts and the fittings comes with everything . The 110 did not included contacts! Just exam 40 and they overcharged me for fitting, 70 dollars!!! Idc what they said and yes it was like throw money down the drain. I had to order my contacts somewhere else. And they also go my vision wrong. Last year I was a -4.50 on one eye and the other is a -5.00. There’s no way it got reduced from those to -4.25 and -4.00!!! They made me so angry that I was screaming my head off cussing over the phone about them ripped me off!!! I want my money back ! I shouldn’t even give him a one star!!!

name: Sandra George
text: Great staff and place to go for your eye care. Dr. Wallace is very knowledgeable.

name: Bernadette Brock
text: Everyone was so helpful and kind I thoroughly enjoyed my experience

name: Justin Reed
text: I have always great service here from the time I walk in to the time I walk out. I was greeted by Kimberly at the front desk with a smile. In less than 1 minute, I was taken in the back room, where Lisa went through my routine eye exam and then, she took me to the back and Dr. Wallace was working on my vision asking questions and answering my questions about concerns.  After the eye exam, I was taken to choose my frames with the help of Jessica. She helped me choose some frames and took me step by step on my lenses. It is always a wonderful experience, when I go in there and I would recommend anyone needing eye care to go to the Family Eye & Laser in Ozark, Alabama.

name: Harold Phillips
text: During my last visit I had the most pleasant experience ever during an eye exam. Everyone was so thorough and precise and professional but yet warm. Thank you Dr Wallace and team!

resp.text: Harold, we were so glad to have you in our office recently! Thanks for the incredibly kind review of our team!

name: Lamoina Brooks
text: Dr. Wallace is exceptional.  She is thorough, patient and  knowledgeable with a personal touch in caring for her patient. I highly recommend her for your eye care needs. Her staff is great.

resp.text: Lamoina, we love Dr. Wallace too and we are so pleased you had an excellent experience in our office recently.

name: Cynthia Messick
text: As always I am quite satisfied.

name: Kimberly Henderson
text: Clean, personable and up to date on the latest technology.   Love Dr. Wallace and her staff.

resp.text: Thank you for your kind review Kimberly!

name: Sandy Gainey
text: This office was very flexible with working me in during my lunch hour and pretty much at the last minute and I appreciated that.  Since I felt there was a problem with my prescription they helped me go through the tests again to confirm it’s accuracy.  I believe we found the source of the problem I was having.  The only reason I didn’t give them 5 stars is that out of four different assistants who helped me this day other than the eye doctor only one of them was friendly and cheerful.  The other three just tolerated me.  The doctor’s great.  I recommend using her business, would be better if she updated her staff with people who are happy to help others.

name: Kim Newman
text: Everyone was very kind and  helpful to me and my mother thank you guys for  everything💕

resp.text: We see patients as family and we are so glad to have you and your mother in the office!

name: Robert Himes
text: Family Eye and Laser, in Ozark turned out to be one of the most pleasant medical appointments I've had in quite a while. All of the staff were friendly and helpful. Every process was explained to me and the doctor was thorough in her examination of my eyes, including the complications that diabetes can cause. I'd recommend this facility to anyone in need of a comprehensive eye exam.

resp.text: We are so glad you had a great experience at our office! Thanks for the great review!

text: Kimberly, Jessica, Erin & Dr. Tammy Wallace were all so pleasant, friendly and informative! They answered all my questionS, explained each procedure & made me feel comfortable. resp.text: Dr. Wallace and her team loved your shout out! We are glad you had a pleasant experience in our office! Thanks for your review!

name: Matthew Godwin
text: Awesome experience at Family Eye & Laser! Everyone was super friendly and helpful. Cassidy did an awesome job of explaining all the small tests and was very caring. She does everything that she knows in order to treat her patients. Will never go anywhere else!!!

Dr Wallace was very nice everybody was really nice professional we had no wait time the longest part of the visit was picking out my son's glasses I am looking for to next year and another visit they did this scan on his eyes that showed everything in the. I recommend it
It's well worth the money a very happy parent

For some that might be fine and this place would be great. For me I just couldn't.

name: Terry Creel
text: I had an infection on my eyelid and just moved to yhe area and was in alot of pain.the eye lid it self was inflamed really bad.so i located a eye center only a couple miles from me.one of my sisters had recommend a Dr.Tammy Wallace.so she had made an appt for me ironically the following day.i was somewhat skeptical of seeing someone i had no ideal of what there professionals would be like.i was there maybe 15 mins and a young lady came and greeted me took me to a room and seemed very concerned of the problem.soon after her exam Dr.Wallace came in and time with me checked out the problem and said she thought she could basically resolve my problem.had me to go home and do these few things and to come back in a week and if that wasnt the problem she would seek extra testing.she gave me a prescription of antibioctics.within a couple days the swelling had gone down.on the next visit she was pleased of the progress.that Dr knew exactly what it was before i had lft her office.Dr.Wallace is truly a godsent for me.very knowledgeable and a personality that could light up four city blocks.my thanks to her superior service and bedside manor.only wish there were more Drs like her around.

name: Corinthia Bennett
text: They were very professional and made me feel very comfortable. The dr explained things to me about my eyes and they took my bp to! This is my new eye Dr. Thanks Family eye & laser.😉

resp.text: Corinthia, we are so glad you had a pleasant experience and YES, we do check blood pressure which surprises some of our patient but there is a myriad of systemic diseases, like blood pressure, that can cause ocular complications. So your blood pressure is an important piece of information for your medical doctor AND your eye doctor.

name: Darrin A Myers
text: Very thorough. Probably best exam I've had in years!

resp.text: We love to hear that Darrin - we pride ourself on the comprehensiveness of our exams. Your eyes are important to us.

resp.text: I am so glad you enjoyed your visit at our office! We have been working hard to resist the transition of the industry into cheaper lower quality products. At this time, we do our best to offer products that we would wear ourselves, that will stand up to the daily rigors our patients put them through, and at the best price possible. We design our glasses to provide the best in vision, comfort, and style. Either way, we hope that your experience won’t keep you from returning to see our doctor in the future.

text: VERY good doctor and surgeon.  Cares about his patients, their sight and their comfort.  I now have wonderful vision.  Will be forever grateful to Dr. Zloty.  Highly recommend.

name: Cindy Hurst
text: Dr. Zloty is a professional, gifted, and thorough surgeon. I suffered from Fuchs Dystrophy and my corneas were decimated. He performed corneal transplants that have resulted in my once terrible eyesight NOW being 20/20 vision. His staff are all courteous and caring. Dr Z listens well, follows through on answering any and all questions, and has a superb way of explaining what he knows without being condescending or cold. I can’t give him a high enough review! I opened 2 gifts this morning, they were my eyes. Many thanks!

name: BK Miller Jr
text:
Professional, personable (a "real guy" who talks "with" his patients, not "at" them), and exceptionally competent.  His staff is Top Shelf. Dr. Peter Zloty has earned my strongest recommendation and endorsement.

He identified, recommended a course of action and performed the procedure that successfully resolved a serious, recurrent, viral infection in my right eye's cornea. This had been a recurrent issue for more than 4 decades (FYI, a "service related" injury). Deep scarring was removed, the viral source addressed and probability of future problems mitigated.

Photos 2 & 3 show how my eye typically looked when the virus acted up and the resultant dendrite scar.

He made a point to tell me that any type of scent is not allowed in his office.  I didn't see a sign on the door or in the office so I was taken back by his statement.

text: This concerns my husband, he started going to Dr. John Mason, when he started having problems with his right eye, to find out later when he was sent to Dr. Mason, he had a Retina vein ocullison in his eye, also better know as a stroke in his eye!  They have done several treatments to his eye especially this last September he had to have surgery when his eye started bleeding behind the eye, they repaired it through this surgery, he did lose partial sight in his eye when the stroke occurred but they have helped him so much to have a balance in his eye to and his other eye to secure that his sight will remain good! He goes for regular check ups about every four months! I would highly recommend these doctors to anyone that has eye issues beyond your regular eye doctor that you see yearly! I imagine you probably need a referral since they are specialist! Be sure and check with your insurance provider!

We left untreated.

name: Barbara Wilson
text: Dr was great, explained everything. Staff polite.  Time spent in ER, 11 hrs. Needs improving. Only 1 person in waiting room when I arrived.

name: Will Slappey
text: The other day my 16 month old son needed to be seen here. The nurses gave him a stuffed monkey and were so sweet. The doctor that saw William was thorough and communicated well. This was our third experience here in the last three years, and all of our visits have gone well.

name: Mary Ladner
text:
I just left the emergency room and going in I was skeptical, mainly because I had read the other reviews.  I am so glad I didn't feed into the negativity and decided to judge for myself. Dawn was my nurse and so pleasant and patient with me.  I also was seen by Dr Juan? spelling may be incorrect but also very nice. I learned what my mother had already taught me, never assume you know based on the opinions of others, judge for yourself. Great advice momma R.I.P and thank you. I am still listening :)

Also the Dr. can really rock a handlebar mustache!

name: George Guilford
text:
First impressions are everything in repeat business! I am very disappointed in my "very short" visit with Dr. Rosenstiel and staff. (Well I didn't even meet Dr. Rosenstiel???!) Being that I live in Montgomery, I have to request a day off for ALL my eye appointment visits.  I am not new to UAB Callahan Eye Hospital as I've had multiple surgeries within the last three years there. As a matter of fact I just had an appointment there two weeks ago with the incredible Dr. Priscilla Fowler and staff.   I've been diagnosed with Kerataconus and Dr. Priscilla Fowler is my primary eye doctor.  Dr. Fowler and staff are some of the nicest people I've met in the eye care industry. Earlier this year and this past month I received the Cross-Linking  procedure.  I spent over $6000 within the last three years at Callahan eye.  Dr. Fowler and staff treat me with respect on EVERY visit,  yet on December 10 with Dr. Rosenstiel and staff I felt the lesser of.  This visit was scheduled to replace my old sclera lenses with new.  You would think before my arrival they would've did their research on my condition.  Upon my arrival in the room, Dr. Rosenstiel's nurse asked if I ever had sclera lenses?? (I'VE HAD SCLERA CONTACTS FOR THE LAST 6 YEARS??) From there, he goes straight into and I quote, "before we even see you, you have to pay X amount of dollars!?. Furthermore, he adds, "The Lenses will be an additional $XXXX.XX amount of dollars to get them?   Now at this point I was feeling as though they did not want to help me as Dr. Fowler and staff did you for the last couple of years.?  Now do mind you I've already spent thousands of dollars to get my eyes corrected.  The money is not an option, but I felt inferior to his demands.  I also wondered have they even looked in my charts from previous visits.? "Have they even checked my insurance" I thought to myself?  At that point I asked him a series of questions in terms of verifying my insurances and deductibles. To no avail he says nothing will be covered. Now as I mentioned money would not be a concern as I've spent a lot of money to fix my Eye disease. ( As well as the removal of an tumor in my eyelid two years prior ).  More questions came to mind in this parlay with Dr. Rosenstiel's nurse.  At this point I felt that the nurse is trying to rush me so he leaves then comes back with a business card and prices on it. He then states, " if you have any questions please call Melissa" on the business card. I agreed and proceeded to leave. Upon leaving, I felt very embarrassed to even be there. I rushed out and got in my car. I kept thinking to myself "have they even check my insurance". So I called my wife, and she confirmed we do have Eye insurance.  I decided I needed to call them back to confirm and verify with them that I have insurance, the same insurance I've used last three years. Two calls later and one left message, I still have not heard from Melissa, Dr. Rosenstiel , or the male nurse that was talking to me. I never even got to meet Dr. Rosenstiel??? I will still come up to visit Dr. Fowler but I will do my business elsewhere in finding new Sclera lenses!
Very disappointing!!

name: John McDole
text: Whether visiting the Emergency Room or scheduled surgery this is the place to be for anything eye related. Over the years we have never had a problem or bad experience or even an unpleasant encounter. Everyone is very professional. The doctors offices being within the complex make it convenient and the parking deck connects to the complex.

text:

What is not fine is the complete lack of foresight or common courtesy to call today's patients to inform them they may have to wait longer we have been waiting for 2 hours and are looking at atleast another hour wait before our son is seen. This office is a perfect storm of incompetence and disregard for their patients.

text:
Only because I can not put zero as an option! I spoke with a man ,who barely allowed me to even talk, and he kept telling me there's no way my daughter's appointment is there, I still have the letter as proof. My daughter is not even 2 and needs eye surgery badly. Her appointment is scheduled for 4/2/18 but as I said he told me there is no way she has one there.

I have 2 kids they are my world. This issue needs to be resolved. If my daughter doesn't get her surgery because the man I spoke to is incompetent, I'm not going to be a very happy mom and if any of you are parents you'd understand.

name: Chris Mahan
text: It is very concentrated on helping people live better, and the medical staff is excellent.

name: Miss Un-PC
text:
My mom and I were rear ended severely a while back by a young boy more interested in his cell phone than his driving.
At first, I didn't notice anything wrong. Later that night, my right eye had a shadow-like film over it. I didn't think anything about it at first. Later that week, I notice my vision was decreasing. I was half blind in my right eye. I went to my eye doctor. After a check-up, he said my retina was partially detached. And, had I waited a week or so longer, I would've have gone permanently blind in that eye. I got an appointment at the Callahan Eye Foundation.
The doctors, nurses and receptionist were very nice. The surgeon did a fantastic job reattaching my retina. The only thing that was a bit frustrating was that gas bubble. But, it kept pressure on my retina. Now, my vision in the right eye was like it was before the accident.
If you have a problem with your eyes that a regular eye doctor can't treat, then I highly recommend the Callahan Eye Foundation.

name: Jay J
text: I wish I could give a minus star. I stopped by here with a rash on my skin near my eye after hours. I was afraid that it might swell up and cause me further issue. They sent me to the ER. I asked could I see someone not in the ER so I would not have to pay so much, but they said no. So I saw a doc in the ER. He looked at my eye and said it was a common rash and said he would give me some antibiotics. He stepped out with the door open and talked to the nurse. I caught them laughing and looking back at me because I came in for a skin rash near my eye.  I believe I was in there for almost 2 hours and I did not see another patient. The lady at the front desk was rude, the staff was rude and even with insurance I still had to pay over $300 .

name: Josie Williams
text: Very knowledgeable about everything i ask never left me wondering i never had any doubt about what was going to happen. Very professional teams

text:
Do not take your child here.  You can get the exact same care at children's hospital.  1)they use the same doctors 2) children's hospital has a lot more respect your time.  I've been to both....The eye clinic time was RIDICULOUS,  2) children's accepts more insurance providers like medishare.

I spent a lot more money a LOT more time, and less customer service.

They couldn't even call in our prescription after being there for 5 hours!!!!!!

Waited one hour for the nurse to come back with our prescription.  No call for that.

Very disappointed.

text: My daughter went to the ER there. He eye was red and she couldn't see threw it. The docs there said there was a white spot on her cornea but they didn't know what it was. Instead off calling in an attending doctor they sent her home work gel drops and told her to make appt with cornea doc the next week. She went in on weekend. name: Dani Perry
text: Very rude and uninformed staff!!! When I made a appointment, the rep said my insurance was accepted. However, when I got there they said they only accepted VSP. So I went all the way down there and took off work for nothing! How does the biggest eye hospital in Birmingham, not accept federal insurance? Sounds fishy to me! Then they wanted me to pay $15 to park! Absolutely not!

text: I have keratocotus in my left eye for a couple years it's a condition we're the cornea has changed shape or has wore down the staff which cause your vision to only be corrected with a special made lense to fit your eye ,eye glasses nore regular contacts can fix this condition the  Dr and staff we're very polite and we're able to determine my condition and fit for one of these lense so after 2 yes of being blind in my left eye I can finally see again with the lense although I have learned of a proceedure called cornea cross link that can permanently fix my condition I am hoping to talk too the Dr about and have it done thank you UAB Callahan Hospital

name: Alex Farris
text: Great place to see the best eye doctors in the region

name: Bert Bloomston
text:
I was extremely pleased with the  personal care and attention provided me when I arrived at CEH. I arrived a few minutes prior to the appointed time and waited just a short time prior to be taken to a bed where I was prepped for my cataract surgery. I honestly did not have the feeling that I was in a medical facility, but a facility designed  for the extreme care and concern for a person. All of us, I believe, have anxiety prior to a surgical procedure, however the staff made me feel comfortable and relaxed. I took special note that Mr. Sprayberry was on the floor chatting with the patients and the staff. That is certainly a rarity in today's world of medicine and certainly could not be found in many or any facility today. Also, I learned that there was patient advocate on the floor.
Congratulations to all and to Dr. Sara Mullins for the outstanding treatment and personal attention. Your hospital is way above just first class.
Thank you again and I told many of my friends about your outstanding service and personal care.

name: jesse anderson
text: Didn't  have  today wait  long  for  appointment   and  was very  impressed  by the way I was treated  and care for  while I was there. Staff  was very  helpful and knowledgeable.

Closed down 7 out of 9 operating rooms. Arrived 15mins early for my appointment. Ended up leaving after 6 hours of waiting with other patients still ahead of me waiting for surgery!

name: Kimberly Frost Barry
text: This is for the parking at the hospital. Don't bother bringing a stroller for your children. Not every floor has a ramp to get in the building. It was very difficult lifting our double stroller up four stairs on Friday.

name: Teresa Paquelet-Brown
text: We are Montanans, visiting our daughter at U of AL in Tuscaloosa, when my husband had a partially detached, torn retina, that required a 1 hour drive and emergency surgery at Callahan. From the staff at the front desk, to the surgery nurses, and the entire surgery staff, I couldn't be more thankful! we received top notch care and customer service! Thank you! We are so fortunate for the outstanding care we received there! Thanks to Dr's. Sapp, Tabakoli,  NRSA McMullen,  Nurse Alice, Terry ( family aid) and anyone else I may have missed or whose name is misspelled!

name: Laura Jackson
text: Great Doctors! Horrible Optical Shop!!! Waited  2months for glasses! The family just goes next door to UAB eye care for the glasses.

name: Sharon Vasser
text: Saw an eye Dr there who misdiagnosed my eye problem and now suffer vision loss.

name: Deilia Hodgman (SandraDee)

text: I went to the free Lion's clinic and I got a bill for $30.00 from them. They didn't even give me a prescription for glasses, but they said the fee was for the REFRACTION!!!

text: Went to Ashley Dahl for eye exam.  Receptionist wouldn't speak until I got her attention. Waited forever and asked when I would go back and she said "I only put the charts back there". Bad experience for sure and I ended up leaving before even getting seen.

text: I myself will never come here again.   I came to this location in 2015.  Was not pleased.   I am here now march 2018 and it is no better.  I have been here over 3 hours.   Mind you this is emergency!  I was the only person here and i was told to sit and wait.  After 20 minutes I asked how much longer.  I was called up 10 minutes later.  Put in room for 40 minutes.   Doctor finally came in.  I have and and am still sitting in room after doctor and this had been over 45 minutes.  Why?  I was only patient here.  No matter.  No more money from me.

text:
(Translated by Google) Top notch petsonnel

Top notch petsonnel

name: Telimea Sanders
text: My daughter started off going to the Bel Air Mall location the staff was wonderful. We changed locations due to us moving and for convenience.  The worst decision I ever made. The Schillinger Rd. Semmes location.  The Doctor is Awesome and the front desk staff is horrible unprofessional.  I would call in to make appointments and would be left on hold entirely too long .I would try calling back and speak with someone and the girl would have a attitude.  I left word to speak to a clinical manager never received a call back.. I called for weeks about my daughter's retainer and I have yet to get a response or the retainer that was paid for in advance..every time I call im left on hold. They really need to change office staff or send them back through customer service training and discuss professionalism with them.

name: Thomas Gardner
text: My wife and I had our annual eye exam today and Sarah was just wonderful. And as always Dr. Perry was a pleasure to have as an eye doctor been going to her for years will not go see anyone else!!! Thank you Sarah and Dr. Perry for the great office visit today.

name: Teresa Henderson
text: The staff made me feel real welcome and most importantly, comfortable with my visit. I would recommend Mobile Bay to any of my friends and family (and I already have)!

name: Trenton Hughes
text: I've been trying to get an appointment to install a tooth on my implant for two weeks now. Every time I call to schedule they tell me they will call me back and i have yet to hear from someone.  No one seems to know the proper steps or protocol to schedule me an appointment. Staff needs better knowledge of what's going on. I've been a patient with Mobile Bay Dental for over 15 years. I'm left with no choice but to find another Dentist office. Smh!!!!

name: Brenda Love
text: They are awesome.Always have a great experience when I come here. Christy is the best.

name: Marie Pocase
text: The hygenist Kristy is awesome. She didn't lower me to the floor but let me sit at a comfortable setting. She is very caring & attentive to my needs. I highly recommend her.

name: Jessica M.
text: My family has been coming to this location for 6 years and it has always been a wonderful experience! The staff are very friendly and always willing to make the client feels comfortable and cared for. Our hygienist, Kristy, is absolutely AMAZING. She is very thorough, knowledgeable, and precise.

name: India Hope
text: This was my first visit and Kristy took care of me. Very fast and very attentive. Made me feel more than comfortable just with her warm smile!

name: Bobby Carter
text:
Kristy she was great it was the best dentist visit ever!!
So professional and polite experience.  I will be back for more visits!!!!

name: JANICE KIDD
text: Hey I had a great 👍visit with the dentist and hygienist Kristy she is a wonderful and pleasant person to have a a hygienist Thank you so much.

name: Tanya Powell
text: What’s the purpose in having an appointment?? They send out a message saying be here on time and no later but yet we’ve been here for 45 minutes and people that came in after us have already been seen and left. I’ve never in my life been looked at as our time means nothing. Get with the program!! STOP over scheduling if you can’t see patients on time.

name: PJ Willis-Jackson
text: The best dental experience ever ! My hygienist Kristy is awesome! No long wait time, cater my every need and concerns.Friendly staff and calm atmosphere. Top notch Dentist who explain procedures thoroughly

name: Tiffany F
text: I give my overall experience 5 stars from the ladies at the front desk to the ladies in the back but, Christy the hygienist does an excellent job. She shows a passion for what she does. She goes above and beyond to make sure her patients are comfortable.

name: Eula McClain
text: Had a very pleasant visit with Krisity the hygienist  she had an awesome personality and did a great job, also front staff was very nice as well!

name: BriAnna Gardner
text: If I could give this place a ZERO, I really would! I had 2 extractions done for my wisdom teeth on last week and I’m so happy that I was late or it would have been 4! I couldn’t imagine having 4 teeth pulled because this place sent me home with NO ANTIBIOTICS. Only pain pills! I noticed that the pain was beginning to be a bit unbearable so I called and ask if it was normal and if I could come in. The RECEPTIONIST proceeds to tell me that everything was normal. She’s not a dentist so I called back to schedule an appointment to come in. My appointment was at 4:00. I didn’t even make it to the back until 4:40 after asking if I was forgot about! A heavier set girl in at the front desk said very dry “well they had to squeeze you in” as if I was a burden or something!   She left for the rest of the day. The other RECEPTIONIST I asked ignored me when I told her I’d been there for 40 min and never even got up to see what was going on Smh! The entire time I’m sitting in the waiting area the vision department was clapping and dancing to music (imagine how that feels to hear loud clapping after having your teeth pulled) VERY unprofessional! I finally was in the back at this point. The assistant that helped me was very nice and patient! I hate the fact that I didn’t get her name but I loved her attitude and how she was willingly trying to help me! I was sent home with antibiotics! The same antibiotics they said they didn’t give after a extraction smh and steroids for my swelling. He also gave me more tabs for pain as if I’m a junky or something or if that was going to make me happy. I’m not going back at all. Thanks but no thanks. On another note! They need to get better receptionist or this place will be going down hill! Never ever again

name: Hermosa Travels
text: Mobile Bay Dental is HORRIBLE all the staff needs to go to customer service 101everytime I come here for an appointment there is new staff no consistency at all you can't build a patient and staff relationship which is very important to some patient who comes and get dental work every 6 months. And the new dentist  they have now is TERRIBLE Dr. Rich that is he has no people skills and he preformed a horrible job on my fillings leaving me unable to floss and with a uneven bit for 4 days I had to make appointment with another dentist Dr. Rich was also flirting with his assistant making me feel very uncomfortable I wouldn't recommend Dr. Rich to work on a animal's mouth so please DO NOT take your family here

name: Sandra Anderson
text:
My Visit today was great and easy thank you Kristy for making is easy and painless and took care of me and my x-rays nurse was nice as will..
Thank you all.

name: Jinna Muhammad
text: Kristy did a awesome job with my cleaning. Very knowledgeable and great conversation. She definitely kept me entertained and made me comfortable. Never had an issues at this office. Thanks Kristy and Mobile Bay Dental!

name: Brittany Carter
text: Kristy and her team at Mobile Bay Dental & Vision has indeed educated me and worked full positive energy. Even though the covid moment they had made things feel safe and welcoming. They have respected my time, addressed my oral issues, and left me with my smile on my face so my personality can be my autograph!

name: Terika Murrell
text: My cleanings are always on point. The best Kristy always have my smile 😃 together..

name: Happiness On Purpose
text: The dentists are awesome, front desk help...not really. Dry and very unfriendly and it seems that's acceptable because others are reporting the same and nothing changes.. Northcutt is full of friendly faces and Attitudes..

name: Brea Lang
text: It was an amazing experience Kristy was perfect she made me comfortable. The overall experience from the front desk to all staff in the back made my experience enjoyable. I love them🥰🥰🥰🥰🥰

text: I love this dentist, very nice workers and sweet people. Very friendly and work well and can cooperate with kids. Kristy cleaned my teeth and she was very sweet , outgoing , and nice sense of humor. I highly recommend 😊

name: Brittany Umbrello

name: Curt K
text: Awesome folks! Dr. Perry and her staff are caring, personable and professional! Love my glasses!

name: Kimberly Theresa
text: We have been using Mobile Bay Dental & Vision in Semmes for 4 years now and couldn’t be happier. Both of our children LOVE going there. We have always had positive experiences there. The staff is amazing and has always treated us with nothing but kindness and respect. Dr. Perry was especially fantastic with my youngest during her recent eye exam. I cannot recommend this place enough.

name: xzavius hill
text: Highly recommend me, my kids and a few family members go. They make sure all of our needs are met and I’m always pleased with their services. If there’s anything wrong they’ll assure to correct it.. This is surely a place I would recommend...

name: Natel Matthews
text: I’ve been going here for sometime. Kristie my DH is great! The staff are friendly and informative!

name: Nurse 2008
text: This place is HORRIFYING the staff is unfriendly and let’s not talk about Dr. Rich he is unprofessional on so many levels and don’t know how to do his job properly had to go to another dentist to get dental work corrected p  please don’t take your family members to see Dr.Rich I wouldn’t allow him to work on my animals

name: Fearless Christian
text: Dr.Gast is the most amazing dentist ever.I thank God I went to him.Another dentist left me in bad shape and Dr.Gast helped me so much.He is a great dentist and a great person.

name: Stacy McInnis

name: Lisa Walker

Amy the hygienist was sooo awesome with him as was Dr. Hankinson!! Thank you Mobile Bay Dental!  We will be back in October for the Vision exam. Looking forward to it!

name: Repent
text: I took my daughter to get her wire fixed at this location for the first time, and I hope we never have to go back to this location again for anything else. The girl at the front desk was sweet and also Brandy but I can't say the same for everyone else. 👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽👎🏽

name: Sarah Estes
text: The assistants were great but the dentist was a tad over confident and made it known that it was "casual jeans day" more often than not. A bit unprofessional and he was more concerned with what he was wearing than with actually cleaning teeth, which was quite odd.

name: Shaun Hamner
text:
Awesome customer service! Dr. Perry was incredibly informative; as well as Amanda. Queen was super fun to work with and somehow remembered my name and the exact glasses we looked at 2 WEEKS AGO! Will def recommend you ladies every chance I get!

Side note, coffee could be better.

name: Yolanda Hill
text: My experience here at Mobile Bay Dental and Vision was great.  My hygienist Kristy was great and thorough.

name: Krystle Thomas
text: I have been a patient for over 10 years and I love it here! Everyone is awesome. Hands down the best dentist in Mobile! Thanks for an awesome cleaning Kristi and Dr. Gast has me smiling from ear to ear! 😁😁🥰

name: Kristin Mullins
text: I highly recommend Mobile Bay Dental! From the beautiful office to friendly team, my experience was top notch! Kristy took the time to explain the cleaning process and was an absolute joy to converse with! Dr. Dabbs was very thorough and made sure to explain all options to help with my clenching problem. Overall a great experience!

name: Angela P.
text: This place is not the same since Dr Joshua  Dabbs left. I was not happy with the care received by one of the other doctors so I google searched for Dr Dabbs new location. Thankfully I found him at Advanced Dental Comfort, Fairhope, AL. I drive from Mobile to see him, very easy drive and now I'm back to receiving that exceptional and warm hearted care that I missed :)

name: Billy Bowyer
text: When we arrived they were having issues with their computer. However the professionalism with which the staff carried themselves, we never knew the computers were down until they told us. They were extremely prompt yet we never felt rushed. My daughter was nervous but due to the kind nature of all the staff she began to relax and actually enjoyed herself. The staff was kind, courteous and very informative. When you couple these attributes with the indoor playground, it's a Kidz Paradise wrapped in a dental office

name: Brittany Gamble
text: I love that I’m able to come right after work. Everyone here is so nice and hospitable. I had a great experience!  Christy was amazing and so patience! She was able to explain to me all of my questions and concerns! Can’t wait for my next cleaning!! :)

name: Myeshia Smith
text: Dr Hankinson the owner and doctor at mobile bay dental in Semmes is very rude and so not kid friendly today was his second time being rude to my daughter once before he was rude to her at the bel air location my daughter was crying a little because she was scared to get teeth pulled and he told me he was not fixing to deal with that he didn’t even give my daughter a chance to calm down before he jumped up off his stool snatched his gloves off and walked out the room with no explanation he was extremely rude to us for the second time I will never take my daughter back to mobile bay ever again he has no patience for kids he told me once a bel air mall when my daughter cried he recommended the Semmes location because they were more kid friendly and now we go there this morning and his not kid friendly self was there I was extremely upset at how he treated us both times but today to find out he was the owner really took the cake for me

name: Monet Monet
text: The best dentist office I’ve ever been to!!! My 1 year old daughter felt so comfortable letting them assist her. No literally, you’ll fall IN LOVE with the staff! This is by far the most positive energy.. great atmosphere while waiting to be serviced.. very professional place of business with outstanding personality! They’re patient and they also make you so comfortable. I highly recommend this dentist office. Airport & Semmes location

name: Sara Pate
text: My children have been going to this dentist since they opened years ago... never had a problem, always very friendly, kind and helpful staff. Today on the other hand, I took all 3 of our kids in for their 6 mth checkup and cleaning. The hygienist was WONDERFUL.. the dentist/owner on the other hand was rude, arrogant, and crass. When he told me my oldest had a very deep cavity, I asked how it had gotten so deep in 6 mths, he chuckled and said oh we probably missed it the last time! Also when asking about dental issues that may arise with my daughter who has an autoimmune disease, I was met with incorrect, unsolicited medical advise infront of a room full of people that was very demeaning and humiliating! Needless to say I will be taking our business elsewhere.

name: Elizabeth Moses
text: Front desk was very welcoming! Dental hygienist were GREAT, especially Danielle!! we came in, they did their jobs and we got out at a good time. Highly recommend! Never a bad experience.

name: Liz Stringfellow
text: I’ve been waiting  for four months now for the vision Dr. to except the Medicaid they except Medicaid but not now. If you except Medicaid in the pass you should not stop because of a pandemic. Not right

resp.text: Our Belair Mall location is accepting all patients at this time. Please feel free to give us a call at 251-301-6555.

name: celeste Salazar
text: They called me back almost immediately and sat me in a room for TWO HOURS. After the first hour they numbed my mouth and then made me sit in there alone for another hour. Told the doctor I had been waiting for two hours and he dismissed me & they released me as a patient because I was annoyed of waiting two hours and waiting an hour with my mouth numb. Wasn’t gonna come back anyways 🤣✌🏼 Weak place frfr .

name: MrsTJay Johnson
text: I always enjoy my visits here at Mobile Bay Dental! They are so very nice and sweet! Always make me feel like I am at home! I love the way Patrica cleans my teeth!

name: Enocolis Lampkin
text: They are so nice, sweet and professional at the semmes location. kristy and Dr. Gasty  and staff was wonderful.

name: Vickie Collier
text: I have been taking my 2 girls to the one downtown and I give everyone there 5 ⭐'s. Now I take my grandkids to the one in Semmes. I'm so thankful that Dr. Hankinson expanded to other parts of Mobile County.

name: Denisse Lamastra
text: Both my kids are both dental patients here and the staff is always friendly and helpful. On my last visit, Gabby in Vision went the extra mile to help me as I was picking up a frame for my sons new glasses. She heard what I was looking for and helped me find it. She was patient and helpful. I appreciated that she was not in a rush just to get it done, but was attentive and giving me great customer service. I would 100% recommend this place for anyone with children.

name: Margaret Texmed
text: I Always leave here feeling great about my teeth. Danelle was amazing and so knowledgeable about her craft. Love that they all do their best to save my teeth. See you soon Mobile Bay Dental.

name: Kimberly Phillips
text: Love the staff of the dental and vision. It's very family friendly and the staff are very accommodating. It even has a little door for little kids to come in and feel independent.

name: Lori Oliver
text: This place is great! When I first walked in it was a little hectic, they have a play area for kids which is amazing, but the also have a adult only waiting room which was very nice. The staff here is top notch. Everyone from the girl at the desk that checked me in to the dentist was friendly and knowledgeable. I have a little anxiety when seeing any doctor and the dentist was kind and understanding of that. I had a tooth pulled, painless and unbelievably quick. I would recommend this place to anyone! Thank you Mobile Bay dentist!

name: Heather Davis
text: The staff at mobile bay dental did a wonderful job for me and my children today. Danielle was the best, and I couldn’t have accomplished 3 cleanings at once without them.

name: christine bryan
text: Ashley did a Great job! Very thorough with cleaning, very informative and patient with my questions. Dr.Geiss was very nice. Look forward to next visit.

name: Jennifer delaune
text: Love this office! Dr. Perry is amazing! She explained things to me that I have never experienced before with any other optometrist. She really cares about her patients. All the staff was very sweet as well. We will definitely be back!!

name: Robin Andrews
text: I have been using Mobile Bay Dental for years. They are really great!! I always feel like they really care about my teeth & they have always been very friendly & the building is beautiful as well!!

name: Lamar Griffin
text:
most unprofessional business I've ever dealt with.
won't let me give zero stars.

do yourself a favor and go elsewhere.

name: Jamarcus White
text: Had a Good Day Today. They Was Quick And Fast. Kristy was my hygienist and Educated Me On Things I Didn’t Know. Had a great Overall Experience

name: Liz Nguyen
text: Patricia was amazing. I learned a lot while she cleaned my teeth. It was painless also. I’ve never had such a great experience! I usually hate getting my teeth cleaned but she made it easy!

name: Vanessa
text: This place is amazing if you have kids. The staff is patient and caring, plus they have an indoor kids theater and playground.  Madison and Kelly made my daughter feel extra special and they took care of us quickly. They accept All Kids and have a nice waiting room. The kids dental area has seating for parents and vibrant saltwater fish decor.

name: Gail Shields
text: Dr. Gast and his assistant are AMAZING! I have had several dental issues, and he ALWAYS takes his time and does a remarkable job. He is extremely professional, and cares about his patients. His assistant does also. I wish I could give them both more stars, but he will forever be my dentist. His office staff is ALWAYS friendly. I highly recommend Dr. Gast and his staff.

name: Victoria Meeks
text: I love Dr Perry, and staff !!

name: bex bama
text:
I went to this dentist a few months ago to have a crown glued back in. It only took approximately 2 minutes, total. However, I was in the office well over 3 hours. When I left, the lobby lights were off, no staff was available to check me out. The crown hasn’t come out since but a patient’s time should be considered. The fact that crown is still holding is the only reason they get 1 star.
Now, I brought my mother in today for an extraction. Although she was called back just 7 minutes past her appointment time, I fear I will be waiting for them to finish the job till the lobby is closed yet again.
I, personally, will not continue seeing the dentists at Mobile Bay Dental because I do value my time. Apparently, the staff at this particular dentist does not.

name: James Bosarge
text: it was a great experience!

name: Cassandra Dumas
text: The dentist was super nice and kept coming back to check on my daughter just to see her reaction of her new caps which she loves. Just putting in the extra effort was amazing. Kelly was super sweet and she gets five stars from us any day. Thanks so much for a wonderful experience. We love you Kelly!!!!!

name: ADAM N
text: Mobile Bay Dental is the best dentist's office I've ever been to. Super clean. Friendly staff. Great service.

name: Shagy Seven
text:
Great care, made sure I was comfortable. Was one of the best visits I've had to the dentist! The price was also more fair than others I shopped around with. Was fortunate enough they could squeeze me in on a Friday on short notice.
I will definitely be back for the rest of the work I need! Thanks to the staff I had working on me!

name: Manuella Coleman
text: I went to the location in the mall and everyone is nice friendly and helpful. The dentist is very kind and considerate of how much pain you are in and tries to be gentle. I am definitely going to come back.

name: Sharon Shula
text: A wonderful day at the dentist. Kristy was helpful and friendly.

name: Melia Nicholson-Franklin
text: I love the staff and the facility. My kids do also!! Very adult and kid friendly!! Thanks for all the help Danielle!!!

name: Jamie Newsome
text: This dentist office deserves more then 5 stars. Awesome staff, very clean and all around great place! If you need a dentist go see them!

name: kristen holcombe
text: I had a good visit as usual! Kristy made me feel comfortable and she was very knowledgeable!😊

name: Krystal Littrell
text: My kids and I love coming to this location!!! It's kid friendly on one side and then the adult side is calming and relaxing. The staff is amazing and friendly. I've had a ton of work done on my mouth after I had an accident in December and they've made everything simple and easy and explain all my procedures in terms that I can understand. Truly recommend this location for the entire family.

name: Christina Daughtry
text: My eight year old had a horrific experience a couple of years ago when having dental work done. The young lady, Jessica, who helped him was very friendly and understanding. After administering nitrous oxide, my son calmed down and the procedure was completed very quickly and painlessly. I am extremely grateful for the patience, understanding and level of professionalism I experienced during our visit and would recommend this dental practice to all of my friends and family.

name: Kimberly Chappell
text: Well, I will never go back there, because they charge you taxes on your total  bill instead of charging you taxes on what you pay!!!! I ended up paying $100 extra then I would have if I went somewhere else!!! They need to  inform you more and explain it better!!! Because I would have took my prescriptions somewhere else. I have been getting glasses for 5 years and I have ever paid taxes on the total!!! I always paid on what my portion was!!! Please read all the reviews before choosing this vision care!!!

resp.text: Thank you very much for your feedback and for the opportunity to allow us to explain the way that we charge our patients for Sales Tax on ophthalmic materials. Our policies are strictly adherent to the guidelines set forth by the Alabama Department of Revenue. We can only control the activities of our offices, and cannot comment on what policies may be in place at other practices you previously visited. At Mobile Bay Vision, we are committed to providing you with excellent care, and we understand how frustrating paying taxes can be. Unfortunately, we do not have any influence on what state law dictates. We can only follow the laws set forth by our lawmakers.

name: Jessica Folse
text: I love the entire building!! The front desk girls are the best! I came in with 3 of my kids and one of them was my 2 year old son, first time at the dentist, who was nearing the end of potty training and after they finished with him, making his first experience an easy one, and while I was in the back myself, they watched him play on the playground. WELL, he had an accident and peed all the way down the slide and they did not even hesitate! They shut the playground down climbed in that slide and cleaned up the entire thing while I was still in the back! They never once made me feel like it was my fault and they actually blamed it on themselves for giving him water. They are always so sweet and accommodating for me with my 5 kids. As long as this place is open I'll never go anywhere else! And Callie Taylor, Dr. Q and Dr. Gast are the best!

name: Bianca White
text: I don't even know where to start. I feel like the staff was very unprofessional. People were constantly in and out of the room, asking questions, getting supplies having personal conversations over my mouth. Which would have been better had they not been having problems fitting the crown but I felt as though they should have been more focused on that than on greys anatomy. We were there for 3 hours for a fill in and a crown. When it was time to check out there was only one person at the desk and a line of people waiting. When asked if there was assistance available the front desk clerk just told us to call back and schedule an appointment if necessary. Which isn't what we needed but we ended up leaving anyway. Definitely won't be going back.

name: Aaliyah Taylor
text: The staff in the vision center here is amazing! Ms. Leah and Brandy were so helpful and kind. I will definitely be back!

name: Water Staff
text: Great staff! The hygienist, Danielle did an excellent job and was very helpful with questions that I had.

name: Brantley Cook
text:
Wonderful dentistry. Assistants were very helpful and provided a pleasant experience. Calm atmosphere. Great service. I can't wait to come back, actually. 9.5/10

P.S.-Ask for Alicia and Gina! They tended to me and were absolutely wonderful!

name: Ultreya Park
text: Dr. Terry and her assistant were great, as was the woman in the glasses area. They were very patient and explained things very thoroughly and were very understanding with a little bit of fear on the part of my family member. A woman in the glasses area brought out about a dozen other choices that they did not have room to display. I was put on hold for 13 minutes, however when I called to confirm our appt., at which point they almost hung up on me before I could actually get all of the information. And then it turned out that they also did not confirm the location, and so when we arrived at the place that I made the appointment for, they told me that the appointment was for the other location. Fortunately, they were not busy and were able to go ahead with the exam at location where we were. All of that could have been resolved though, with simply slowing down during the phone call, and being more thorough. Or use text to confirm! Great once you get there.

name: Laura Coletta
text: The doctors and hygienists are pretty awesome but the girls at the front desk, not that much.

name: Shemeka Harper
text: I gave 1 stars because it's been a pleasure working with them . The problem is with payments in between the 2 offices and time wasted since they cant get their financial team together . I have 2 daughters with braces and the same issue . They're payment are current and when it's time for the braces to come off and the bill is paid in full , the mall location sends you to the semmes location and upon arrival there is suddenly a 400 dollar bill that pops out of nowhere . Just today we went for my youngest to have her hard where removed and was told we have a 380 dollar bill due from 2017 .... really ???? Mind you the bill had to be paid in full before the appointment could be scheduled for the hardware removal so how is this even possible ... absolute RIP off of 400 per person when it's time for removal. This is not once but twice for us. This time I'm going to the Better Buisness Bureau

Upon entry they will find a separated waiting room from the adults that includes an inside play area and gaming stations. Can't believe I am saying this, but I am already looking forward to my next appointment and would have used the small door if I could fit thru it!

name: Beth Babin
text: The staff are always pretty friendly and the office is amazing. Unfortunately the dentist doesn't seem like he should be working with children. The past two times I have been in,  my son complained of not being numb when they started the procedure and the dentist flat out ignored him.  The first visit (for a pulled tooth) the dentist eventually stopped and gave him another shot, after which he was fine. This 2nd time, we were told we were the ONLY patients in the office, but the dentist seemed inconvenienced to even come in the room,  didn't say 2 words to me and acted in a rush to leave. He started a filling and my son raised his hand and made noises to let him know he could feel it, but the dr kept going and told the nurses "He's fine." Then when my son finally jumped & grabbed his hand, he got aggravated and said to refer us to a pediatric dentist to be sedated. Very rudely made a point to say he wasn't even touching his teeth when he jumped. He didn't even offer to give him another shot or try to comfort him/talk to him about what he was feeling. My son is 11, knows what he can feel & has never had this problem with other dentists. :( I am very disappointed that an office so heavily geared towards children & close to home, has such an impatient & unkind dentist.

text: I have been a patient of Dr. Hankinson since 2005 and his expertise on what he does is amazing. He have a very professional staff and they are always ready to say or do something to make you comfortable. I was in the office about two weeks ago to get a permanent crown on a tooth that I had gotten a crown on about three years ago. Dr. Hankinson replaced that crown because he said that he felt that it should have last longer than that. I did not go in to received a free crown, I thought he could cement the old crown in considering that it was still pretty, but he insist on doing another one free of charge. You really don't see that kind of act of kindness today. He is a remarkable young man and he is very attentive with every patients. I have recommended many people to him and I will continue to do so, and he is VERY SMART. Please check out that SEMMES LOCATIO lt is beautiful. Thanks a Bunch Dr Hankinson.   .NINA BOLDEN

text: Staff was excellent and the entire LASIK process was comfortable. They are happy to answer any questions or concerns and will ensure that you receive the best treatment. My vision is better than 20/20 after my LASIK treatment!

name: Terri Shrader Williams
text: Dr.Ramsey and the entire staff (esp Lisa) went above and beyond for my PRK surgery. It was reschedule multiple times (thanks to Covid and other random issues) but they always kept in touch and reassured me that everything would be perfect. FINALLY when the night came to get PRK (not a candidate for lasik) it went so fast, the staff and doctor kept me calm the entire time and talked me through the entire procedure. They made sure I knew I could contact anyone if I needed anything or had questions. The surgery and recovery was a breeze for me and I was driving the next morning. 3 weeks later I have 20/20 vision. The entire staff was professional, friendly and enjoyable to be around!

name: Danielle Moon
text: Dr. Ramsey did my PRK one month ago and I already have 20/20 vision! Highly recommend Huntsville Laser Center!

name: Kyle Holt
text: Lisa is the best technician, and Dr. Ramsey is a perfectionist. Highly recommend.

name: jarrod hand
text: I had lasik 6 weeks ago with Dr Ramsey and I am thrilled!!! I am seeing 20/15 in both eyes and could not be more happy! Everyone from reception area (Christy) to the workup (Lisa and Libby) were all fantastic! I highly recommend HLC!!

name: Ashley Phillips
text: I just had Lasik with Dr. Ramsey and his amazing team yesterday. From Christy's friendly smile at the front desk to Libby's kind touch in the exam room and explianing everything to all of the techicians that hold your hand through the process and Dr. Ramsey's highly skilled hands, the entire process was amazing. Thanks to everyone that played a role in my procedure! Today at my post-op appointment I am seeing 20/15 and it has not even been 24 hours yet! That is the best I have ever seen even with corrective lenses. I wish I had done this years ago and highly recommend this professional team to anyone that has been thinking about Lasik.

name: Jim Hennessey
text:
Arrived for my appointment, lobby was empty. The woman at the counter shouted across the room that we needed to wait and she would get with us (me and my wife).

She then shouted across the room about who our insurance carrier was? My wife provided that information and the lobby “boss” we’ll call her because that is the nicest I can describe her attitude.

The Lobby boss then shouted we don’t accept that, my wife replied “yes, you do” my wife checked before making our appointment. The lobby boss then made us shout our  SSI numbers across the room so she could check. Violation of our privacy.

Lobby boss then ordered us to adjust our masks as they did not meet with her approval. Shortly thereafter the “lobby boss” then got into my wife’s personal space and the ordered here to replace her mask as it did not meet with the “lobby boss’s” approval.

At that point my spouse and  I elected to leave. We were going to have vision checks, buy glasses, purchase contacts and have lenses replaced buy two pairs of glasses. That was conservatively a $1,000.00 bill.

Getting into paying customers personal space, treating them rudely, treating personal private information without care is unacceptable.

Avoid this place at all costs.

resp.text: I apologize for your experience in our office.  We strive for excellent customer service.  Thank you for your feedback.  I will address these issues with our staff.  Please feel free to call me 205-949-2020 Tammy G.

name: Mike Campbell
text:
Pros - great doctors and staff, polite and knowledgeable.  Excellent quality glasses (except for cons, see below)
Cons - I'm 61, worn glasses most of my life, and have had various coatings. These coating have never come off, not once.  It's happened with both sets of lenses from Vision First.  Now I just have annoying streaks across my lenses.  Don't know if I can get a pair without the coating because I can never get through to a real person and never a person from the Pell City clinic.  I've left messages but to no avail.  Very disappointed.
UPDATE Apr 2021 - Went back for an exam and received the same excellent service.  They're just really good.  I also learned that the coating was an anti-glare coating that was coming off.  5 stars for the staff.
