text: My family has used Dr. Charles Salisbury for many years.  His staff is very efficient.  We always get professional service.

name: Debra Metcalf
text: Great experience with office staff and Dr. Salisbury.  Was taken in on time for my appointment and there was very little wait time to actually see Dr. Salisbury.  He's very pleasant and easy to talk to.

name: Mary B Byrd
text: The staff is friendly and caring. The wait time is normal for this type of business. The doctor is pleasant, thorough and professional. I have no complaints about my experience with this medical facility.

name: Cynthia Jones
text:
Dr. Salisbury saw my husband which has diabetes. We were throughly pleased with the time he took to answer questions. He gave us options for treatment and did not try to push anything on us. The examination was the most through and complete one he has ever had. My husband has been diabetic for 25+yrs. All in all the visit we had was very positive and he received the treatment needed. Thank you Dr. Salisbury and the entire staff right down to the optical dept.
You guys are awesome.

name: lee neidhardt
text: He’s such a nice man and a great doctor.  I would recommend him to all my family members and friends.

name: S. McEachin Otts
text: An excellent physician whose professionalism, attention to detail, and caring nature have been proven to me over time - a fine staff as well.

name: Joe Murray
text: I've been a patient of Dr. Salisbury's for  about 16 years.  Macular Degeneration in both eyes requiring eye injections periodically to prevent blindness.  Dr. Salisbury has also replaced cataracts in both eyes.  Results? At 81, I'm not  blind and my eyesight is 20/20 left and 20/10 right.  Dr. Salisbury is a superb physician and surgeon and a fine man.

name: Helen Fairchild
text: A quick in and out and happy with my results.  Thank you Dr. Salisbury.

name: Mac Otts
text: Absolutely professional and attentive to your concerns, Dr. Salisbury is one of the best specialty physicians I have known. He knows his stuff, and especially as it concerns complications from diabetes. Also, I rate all nurses and office staff at the top of my experience in terms of courtesy and professionalism.

name: Jennifer Jackson
text: Best eye dr in Mobile. Best staff too.

name: Angela Crowell
text: I have been a patient of Dr. Salisbury for 30 years.  That is an endorsement in itself.  He is a great clinician and  I am 100% satisfied with him and his staff.

name: Leslie Johnson
text: The best! Patient, kind, and thorough.

name: David Holliman
text: You couldn’t find a better Doctor than Dr. Salisbury. He really cares about your well-being and this is shared by his very professional and personable staff.

name: meaghan blais
text: Dr Salisbury and his staff are the best! Very thorough eye exam. First time I ever had my retina checked by any eye doctor.  Would definitely recommend him!

name: David Fesperman
text: Everything was very organized and everyone was friendly and helpful.

name: Debbie Slocum
text: Dr Salisbury has been my ophthalmologist for many years.  He and his staff are always wonderful!

name: Charity Hill
text: My eyes feels much better. I was afraid to get the shots in my eyes but Dr. Salisbury assured me that I would be fine.

name: Kathy Pickard
text: Dr. Salisbury is very professional and has always addressed all of my questions/concerns. I have been using this group since I was 6 yrs old!

name: Maxine Rosen
text: Have total faith in Dr. Salisbury.  Have been going to him for years, as has my whole family.  His staff is super.

name: William Gillerlain, Jr.
text: Dr. Salisbury has repaired a partially torn retina in my left eye; removed a cataract from my right eye and will remove a cataract from my left eye.  Removed the cataract, proscribed lenses, Lens was not right for. Upon recheck, it was determined the script was not written down properly. He replaced the lens at his expense.

name: Carolyn Bailey
text: Very good Dr. who is trying to help save my eyesight!

name: Paula DeMattei
text: Long wait time otherwise good

name: Douglas Hathcock
text: Worked me in when I needed to see him with an eye problem.

name: G. Dan Lumpkin, CMC
text: Excellent Physician.....I highly recommend him

name: david cherniak
text: First Class

name: Warren Crow
text: It had been some time between visits to an optometrist and my more regular ophthalmologists. I found the three assistants and one optometrist to be empathetic to my situation which I think is rare. I was treated well and taken care of by all. I think the eye exam series was the most comprehensive I have ever had. Being in my 60s I had conversations which included discussions of multifocal contact lenses and cataracts plus premium IOL choices. I loved the visit and will continue with this group. I am lined up for a multifocal contact lens fitting (why can't I be without glasses) and know I need an eyeglass pair with new prescription to back up contact lens use.

name: ST FU
text: My (now former) eye doctor requested unnecessary tests. It took months and several unreturned messages to get someone to answer my questions. The office staff and manager were not helpful and lacked urgency in returning my calls. When my call was finally returned the manager was not helpful nor cheerful. They did not care to listen to me as a patient and because of all these issues I do not recommend.

resp.text: Hello, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry to hear about these tests and the difficulty you had reaching us, as well as the treatment by our staff -- this is definitely not the experience we want for our patients! I'd like to learn more about what happened. Could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: lexi ivan
text: I was sent back within 10 minutes of my appointment time. The assistant was very efficient with the preliminary testing. Dr. Hines was very kind and informative. When I told her I wanted monthly contacts instead of dailies, she understood and didn't try to force dailies on me like many doctors. The rep in the frames room went above and beyond to help me pick out frames I was happy with. My first pair came two days after my appointment, and my second pair will be in within 2 weeks. I was very happy with my visit!

name: Erika McDonald
text: Everyone who works here is wonderful but Dr. Schwertz is really above and beyond fabulous! She listens and takes her time to address all concerns you may have and she truly advocates for her patients and what is in their best interest. She provides wonderful care and I highly recommend her.

name: Cindy Bynum
text: I highly recommend these guys! They are so great, efficient, and friendly. I see Dr. White, and she's phenomenal. She ensures to carefully explain everything and address any and every issue I have. You can tell they take great pride in their work and are very thorough. 5+ stars for these guys.

name: Jody Wilson
text: I experienced a long wait time when I went in last week. The Doctor is great. I think if your appointment is at 9:20, you should be seen within 20 minutes. I will admit the I am impatient. All of my other appointments at other establishments see me within 5 minutes.  What’s the point in having a appointment, if you can’t be seen around that time.

name: Jameisha Large
text: Excellent staff and service. I loved the atmosphere it was pleasant and welcoming. I really liked Dr. White he made me feel valued and my exam was informative and comfortable. I did not meet one rude person and neither was I left unattended when I was shopping for eyewear. So heck yeah I will be referring people to this location. Five Stars is what you deserve!

name: Lem Motlow
text: Will be changing offices due to the very poor time management and lack of respect for patients time. Every year i have been going for the past four i have had to wait for at least an hour for Dr. Hines. she is very good and pleasant , however either her or the office scheduling is not good. this is not a COVID issue. this has been each year. I work less than 1/4 mile from this location and with at least 4 other office co workers who use her and  like her but not her time management and lack of respect for patients time as many of us come on our lunch break. i understand emergency come up and may have to wait longer than usual due to unseen circumstances once in awhile but when its every year and joked about at office with co workers who use location office and Dr. then it is not us its YOU

resp.text: Lem, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry to hear about the delays you've experienced visiting our office. I'd like to look into why this is happening -- could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: Larry Futrell
text: Staff very friendly and professional. Dr. Hang is friendly, professional and very thorough with her exams. I always look forward to my appointments because the atmosphere there is delightful and very amiable!

name: Forrest Plummer
text: My first visit to the Hoover location. I was more than impressed with the professionalism by each associate from the front counter all the way around. Kara took care of all the preliminary tests and was beneficial in making me comfortable as I felt I was bombing several eye tests. Dr. Amos was very helpful explaining everything as she went along. I am looking forward to many years to come.

name: April Taylor
text: The entire staff was amazing when we had our first visit there a couple of weeks ago. My daughter and I were made very comfortable and the exam was very thorough. Dr. Hang is wonderful and easy to talk to. We will be coming back here and also bringing the hubby and my other daughter!

name: Fredia Dillard
text: Great place! Love Dr. Amos. I've been with her for 10 years now. She understands my issues and truly listens. She does not rush through an exam and will offer options.

name: Dawn Kirkland
text: Rob Pate and his staff are wonderful.  I always feel like they are so glad to see me and I have a deep level of confidence in the care I am receiving.  I have recommended Dr. Pate to everyone I have talked to who needs a great eye doctor--in fact, my husband is there this morning!

name: Teala McDowell
text: I had a wonderful experience at EyeCare Associates in Hoover! Dr. Amos definitely ranks at the top of the list not only for her physician skills, but also for her amazing care and concern for her patients, personally. I have been recommending her to all of my Alabama friends! If you are reading this review as you look for someone to take wonderful care of your eye needs, look no more...you found her!

name: Michelle Riley
text: From the time you enter the front door until you leave, you will experience excellent customer service. I recently move to Northern Alabama and I have no plans whatsoever to change eye doctors. I will gladly do the long drive.  They have modern equipment, clean and attractive office space and knowledgeable team members.  I'm sure all the doctors are great but I'm on Team Amos!

name: Derrick Mendez
text: As a patient of Dr. Hammond's for over 10 years, I continue recommend her to anyone I encounter who's in search of an eye care professional.  She is always willing to take the extra step to make sure her patients (which include several members of my family) are taken care of.

name: Marilyn Martin
text: I've been with Dr. Amos for about 38 years and always want her to check out my eyes.  She is very professional but also very friendly.  I recommend her to anyone who needs a wonderful eye doctor.

name: Suzanne Eberhardt
text: My children and I are all patients of Dr. Pate's. It has been a positive experience every time we have been to the office, even when we have walked in without an appointment to get my son's glasses fixed. I have also recommended him to several people and would not hesitate to do it again.

name: Latisha A
text: Today was my first visit and I was very impressed with the entire staff especially Dr. Pate.

name: S B
text: Apparently they changed owners and most of the staff has left.  Dr. Amos was fantastic  as usual but the 2 hour appointment, LONG wait, disorganization and terrible service from everybody else will have me looking elsewhere for my next checkup.

name: Brendolyn Terry
text: I miss dr.pate, but dr. Ansley is good too

name: Christian S
text: They miss represented the quality of the frames they sold me. The metal in the frames fatigued after 6 months and I had to replace them at full cost. This isn't why they get the 1 star. The 1 star is for the poor customer service. I will not return and do not recommend them for purchasing frames/Eyewear.

name: ChaLestar Hill
text: This office is absolutely AWFUL!!! Poor customer service and it takes so long to get your order back. I waited an entire month to hear from them and I have yet to pick up my glasses from them.

name: Belinda Marvin
text: The attention to making sure the equipment was cleaned and disinfected before use was very comforting to watch. I felt safe . Every precaution is in place. Hospitals and doctors offices need this level of attention. So take note Eye center South keeps their patients  health and safety first.

resp.text: Belinda, it means so much to us to hear that you felt safe at our office. We are doing our utmost to make sure that our patients remain healthy and are taking every precaution to ensure your safety. It’s wonderful to hear that you appreciated our attention to detail! Thank you so much for taking the time to share your thoughts with us!

name: Gerald Kilpatrick
text: I am a veteran since 1965 and I found this place these doctors. Dr. Bennett @ Dr. Gauldin.  to be some of the best. @their staff  very efficient and courteous.   I would definitely recommend this place to anyone that needed a surgery or treatment or anything to do with your eyes.

resp.text: Thank you for your service, Gerald! We are so happy to hear that you found our staff efficient and courteous. Eye Center South strives to provide the very best for our patients and we are so thankful for your feedback and recommendation.

name: Brenda Deason
text: Dr. Bennet👨‍⚕️ is my hero & a man of God! 🕊I was almost blind and now I see!🕊TGBTG- TO GOD BE THE GLORY!!!🙏

resp.text: Brenda, thank you for the kind words about Dr. Bennett! We hope you enjoy your improved vision!

name: Mary Yates
text: Excellent care.

resp.text: Mary, thank you so much for your kind words. We’re glad to hear that you’re satisfied with the excellent care you received from us at Eye Center South!

name: K-Diva Licious
text: I absolutely love the staff they were all nice and friendly. The doctor is by far the best eye doctor that I have had. She is very thorough and informative. I always enjoy my appointment when I go there it's like seeing old friends.

name: Susan Johnson
text: My grandson’s glasses were broken so we went here to have them replaced or repaired. Gene was able to do a quick, temporary fix; also, gave us a coupon to use to purchase new glasses. We are always pleased when we go here. Dr. Vanoy always takes good care of my family! I highly recommend this location!

name: Tara Orie
text: Rip-off, you can get higher quality services at much cheaper prices out there. In short, my contact prescription was incorrect and my glasses prescription was incorrect; both of which resulted in my glasses being unusable as well as half of the contacts I purchased. In total I paid over $800 for all services and glasses/contacts. And now over a year later, I'm receiving calls from a debt collector claiming that I still owe another $100. Go somewhere else.

resp.text: Tara, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry to hear about your experience in our office! I'd like to look into what happened. Could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: jirah mccall
text: I love this place and the staff! Everyone is very friendly and helpful. I’ve never had a bad experience.

name: shirley jones
text: This is a very clean and professional environment! Dr. Karen is very patience and knowledgeable! She took her time with Sarah whom is disable.I highly recommend her services!

name: Lashaunda Barganier
text: The experience I had was very wonderful. The people there were very nice

name: Christinay Bogan
text: EVERYONE was really nice and verryyyy professional! My sister spoke volumes of you and this is why I chose to come. I am glad I did. I will be bringing my 8 year old daughter next.

name: Lorenzo Jones
text: I look forward to my yearly visit with the doctor and the staff are very pleasant

name: Christopher Cambron
text: It’s funny how I ended up with my appointment. They sent a text to someone else to verify their appointment. I said , they had the wrong number but I needed an appointment. So they set me one. I have never found a sweeter more knowledgeable staff. Looking forward to getting my new glasses. Thanks again girls for a job very well done.

name: Vanessa Cartet
text: Thanks So Very much for An Awesome Experience!

name: Paulette Boston
text:
I had an appointment with eyecare associates about  a month ago.
the optometrist that did my eye exam was very good I was very pleased.
the night mare began once I sat at the desk to choose my glasses.
the associate reviewed the order due to the fact that she was the expert on eyewear. I ended up with additional  things I did not really need on my
glasses. I got them home and could not see my work computer, everything was blurry even reading. I called and informed them that
the glasses was not working,, the optometrist rechecked my eyes and
the prescription it was good. I informed them it was the coating on the
glasses all that extra that had been added. they did an minor adjustment
I still could not see my computer it was still blurry. I  went back a third time and insisted that they remove all those coating-Ultimate Poly-Carb
Addon*Ultimate Poly*Anti-Reflective Premium*UV400, This was close to
ridiculous that I had to spend time running back and forth for a pair of
new glasses that I could not use. After those coatings were removed
I can see my work computer better but they are not better than my old
glasses. I was so frustrated and disappointed  not only to have to go back today to have the associate to remove the black pen mark they left on my
glasses when they were trying to make the corrections. I have never had this much trouble getting a new pair of glasses. This was not the type
of service that I was expecting, It was as if they could not seem to get
my glasses right.

resp.text: Paulette, I'm Cassie. I'm glad you enjoyed the optometrist at your visit, and I'm so sorry about all these issues with your glasses! I'd like to look into how this happened. When you have a moment, could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com? Again, I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: Kat Smith
text: No matter how long it's been, I feel like I'm visiting my family when I come there. Everyone is welcoming, warm, and genuinely glad to see me. I always leave with a smile! Their customer service is AMAZING!

name: audraruth
text: Very nice and professional.

name: Cindy Knox
text: I just appreciate how friendly everyone was. I felt like everyone genuinely cared about me as a person! Thanks for the excellent care!

name: Dawn Wilson
text:
I Love My EyeCare Family❤️
The Awesome Group has never let me down!

name: Nicholas Klein
text: Fantastic experience! I spent a few weeks in Birmingham on business and had experienced some eyesight issues in between my regular eye care checkups. I had a appointment scheduled very quickly and was treated with much care and respect. Everyone on phone and in person were very inviting and helpful and I highly recommend this location for your next eye care visit!

name: Teresa Henry
text: Staff very friendly and professional,Dr always kind and informative feel I'm in good hands with Dr Vanoy

name: oshields07
text: The service & staff is always amazing. Well informative & kind.

name: Homemade with Marsha
text: Everyone was very sweet !  And very helpful.

name: Latricia Faith
text: This was my first time visiting EyeCare Associates, Dr. Vanoy and the staff were very helpful and friendly. Dr. Vanoy thoroughly explained all information pertaining to my eye exam. I am happy that I chose EyeCare Associates for my eye care services.

name: Taylor Campbell
text: Very, very pleased with my first appointment here. The front desk and staff were wonderful! Very helpful and personable. Dr. Vanoy took the time to explain, in detail, something specific about my eyesight that I have never been told before; and I was amazed. After fitting me for the perfect contacts for my needs, I am blown away with the difference. I would highly recommend this office to anyone who asks.

name: Heels & Hardhats
text: Thanks for being so friendly, especially, since I had just buried my dad the day before. I needed the uplift. You guys are amazing and the service was out of this world. Again, Thanks!

resp.text: Ton, I'm so sorry to hear about your dad! Thank you for taking the time to write a review -- I'm so glad we could offer a little comfort. We're very glad to have you as a patient!

name: LP Key
text: Dr. Vanoy is knowledgeable and easy to talk to. The office staff is great as well. I have had great experiences with this office year over year.

name: Lacie Travis
text: The woman who did my exam was wonderful. I do wish there were more frame options. I had a hard time finding a pair I liked. I then had to ask multiple times for my prescription and PD to attempt to look for a pair online. They refused to give a PD unless I bought from them. I was under the impression that it was a part of the exam I paid for. I would've paid a fee for the convenience had that been an option. I ended up going across the street to another chain and they gave me those measurements for free. I was so happy with their service and frame options that I didn't even end up buying online, I bought 2 pairs from them. That little extra courtesy could've been a sale for them. I likely won't go back due to those circumstances. Again, the actual optician was wonderful. They just need more selection and they wouldn't have to worry about losing sales to other chains and online vendors.

name: Izz Noland
text: Thank you to Dr. Karen Vanoy for being thorough and explaining everything very well for my first eye exam. Thank you Carson for going above and beyond and sending me the retina scans, and thank you so much Janice for the process of choosing frames and lenses, getting me the best deals around!

name: ANew Friend
text: I always enjoy visiting the Eye Care Associates, Wildwood location. I appreciate all of the staff. Dr. Vanoy, Janice, Thomasina, and everyone else is always so nice.

name: Lindsey Waldrop
text: Wonderful experience, delightful staff and Dr!!

name: Tikesha Monique
text: Dr. Venoy and the entire staff were amazing.

name: media 411 news and interviews
text: Great experience great staff and awesome doctor

name: JENISE WALKER
text: Absolutely love th Dr, the office and the staff!

name: schadell lewis
text: Great staff and Great atmosphere!!! Everyone was very nice and made my first but not last visit feel like home. Thank you Eye Care Associates for taking out the time to explain everything that I wasn’t sure of.

name: africka overton
text: I love the Eye Care Associate. They are very loving and caring and personal. My children and I have been going there for about 15 yrs. And now my fiance is seen their now. Love you all don't change a thing

name: Jeffrey Marks
text: The staff is friendly the doctor who is on call is absolutely GREAT!!! I mean fantastic!!! The service is great the people are great. I can honestly say this is where I'll be coming from now on :) five thumbs up

name: Dennis Sheffield
text:
Did a great job!   Dr. Vanoy spend alot if time explaining things to me.  Can not think of anything I would change!
BTW, whomever rated this as one star must have meant to review the store two doors down, Dirt Cheap.

name: Lauren Bowerman
text: Great experience overall! The front desk workers were attentive, kind, and helpful, the man who assisted me in the first exam room was wonderful, and Dr. Karen Vanoy was thorough in her exam, answered all my questions, and even sent me a handwritten thank you card after my appointment. Would highly recommend for quality of care and service!

name: Larry Spencer
text:
I thoroughly enjoyed my visit. I am 35 years old and showed up with my mom for support. Lol! I have always been afraid to get my eyes examined; however, everyone was very professional and understanding. Dr. Vanoy explained everything to me and treated me like I was her child. She calmed my spirit. Everything was perfect! Thank you for going above and beyond to make me feel at ease.
The staff even helped me find a pair of glasses to fit me. - Regina Spencer

name: Hai2u Official (Slim)
text: My son had a great experience here, it was his first exam at an eye care place. Very friendly and helpful staff. Doctor was very helpful so was the male assistant. Very quick service!

name: Patricia McDonald
text: Staff is courteous and pleasant to deal with. Dr Vanoy is very knowledgeable and explains everything and answers any questions.

name: Angela Cox
text: They made my daughter very comfortable and at ease with the process of the exams. Dr. Vanoy is very knowledgeable and committed to better eye health of her patients. The staff is very helpful and professional!

name: Jessyca McKnight
text: 9 out of 10. My eyes are still out of focus and seeing starbursts at night from being dialated 2 days ago :-(

name: Sarah Glanding
text: I would recommend coming here the staff was really nice. Everything was clean and I did not mind getting my eyes checked this time

name: Tony Thompson
text: The provider...was excellent and the staff was very courteous too me...

name: nna Coleman
text: They are very, kind and professional people.

name: Devon Stafford
text: Pretty Good Place, Always In & Out. Staff Is Very Friendly & Professional. Only Thing Is I Wish They Would Have A Larger Slection Of Frames For Customers To Select From But Other Than That Great Place!

name: Ellen W
text: Friendly and thorough. Will definitely be going back here when I need a new contact prescription.

name: Charles Diggins
text: They kept calling me begging me to come in for an appointment. I go in for an appointment only to find out that their equipment is not working. I missed work for nothing. NEVER AGAIN FOR ME. PLEASE RUN FOR YOUR LIFE

name: Alex Prowell
text: Greaat customer service and very knowledgeable of all there products

name: Ace Queens
text:
Awful place long wait for my appointment. Never received my contacts. When I called to ask about them why I hadn’t received my contacts I was told they were too busy for me twice. So I had to go get in their face at the store. Made them give me a refund.
Don’t go there!!!

name: Meg Saxon
text: I have been a patient at EyeCare Associates in Wildwood for about 2 years. I enjoy going there for a yearly checkup because the appointments are easy to make and are quick. I also LOVE Dr. McStoots - she is so friendly and does a wonderful job. I can tell that she takes her time with each patient because she is totally focused on me. I have also had great experiences ordering contacts each year through their office. I definitely recommend going here, especially if you live or work close to the Homewood area - it's so convenient!

name: Bill Farris
text: Dr. Lavigne & staff are most friendly, helpful & meet all of my Eyecare needs

name: Mary Reid
text: Dr. McStoots was genuinely concerned and caring-explained in detail concerns without rushing.Her staff was also kind and professional.

name: Peggy Little
text: Highly recommend!! Excellent staff!

name: Rosalynn Jones
text: Awesome staff...very friendly atmosphere!

name: hiram hightower
text: Everyone did an awesome job very satisfied

name: Nakiki Speer
text: Very friendly staff.  Glad that I chose EyeCare Associates to take care of my eye health.

name: Jason Hall
text: Wonderful care from experienced staff!

name: Michael Moore
text: Great

name: Liz Taylor
text: Kind and helpful

name: Veronica Clark
text: Very professional and friendly environment

name: Delois Penn
text: Exceptional and great customer care services

name: Ashlyn Briana
text:
(Translated by Google) Dr. Karen Vanoy is the absolute BEST !!!

(Original)
Dr. Karen Vanoy is the absolute BEST!!!

name: Ashley M.
text:
(Translated by Google) Dr. Vanoy is the best !!

(Original)
Dr. Vanoy is the best!!

name: Don Purvis
text: Dr. Mosteller is one of the finest  people I have ever met. He is also one of the best ophthalmologists I have ever been a patient of. He is very attentive and thorough in the examinations he administers. Many people I know are patients of his and they all say the best about him, too.

name: Kim Pace
text: Love Dr. Mosteller. He always does a thorough evaluation and listens to my concerns.

name: Terry Bacon
text: I have been a patient of Dr. Charles Mosteller for many years. I have compete trust in his clinical advice & the health care he provides.  My ONLY complaint is that the inner-office waiting time continues to get worse.  Years ago the wait was about 15-20 minutes.  A few years ago the stagnate sitting wait-time increased to about an hour.  Two days ago my early morning appointment resulted in a 2-hour wait time.  Dr. Mostellar is GREAT but I'm considering a different physician due to the progressive waste of my time.

name: J. F. McGowin
text: Quick appt and visit but never was rushed.  All questions answered.  Dr. Mosteller and Autumn were great!

name: Richard Mitchell
text: Dr. Mosteller is an excellent physician...well educated, experienced,  very skilled and compassionate. Great "bedside manner."  He obviously cares about the health and well being of his patients.

name: Pamela Vegliacich
text: Dr. Mostellar is very caring and attentive and listens to your concerns. The staff is very friendly and helpful with all your questions. I recommend Dr. Mostellar to all my friends.

name: Gloria Fako
text: The doctor and his staff are wonderful, very caring and make sure you understand. Great experience.  The nurse Lisa in the operating room was awesome and so sweet.

name: Cindy Jones
text: Except for the IV issue, everything and everyone were great.

name: Trecia Phillips
text: Dr. Charles Mosteller’s staff and office environment is excellent. They are careful to social distance everyone as they care compassionately for all their clients. He and his team have consistently served our community  with excellence for decades.

name: Lee Peters
text: Excellent Doctor. Highly recommended.

name: Jimmy Clark
text: Quickly moved through different portions of exam. Very thorough. Pleasant people.

name: Thomas Nelson
text:
I was scheduled for my annual eye checkup at 9:00am. Upon check in I was brought back for tests with minimal wait time. However, once the tests were completed I was then placed in a waiting room for 2 hours during which time no one touched based to provide a time frame or explanation for the delay. I was finally placed in an exam room at 11:15am and spoke with the nurse and then did not see the doctor till 11:30.
The staff are very professional and the only negative that I have is the excessive delay.

name: Robison McClure
text: Most recent checkup was handled expertly-quickly-with total regard to COVID 19  and  spacing.  Greatly appreciate Charlie  Mostellar and his superb staff.  Kudos!

name: Randall Yates
text: I been going here for years. Recently they made changes to speed up eye testing wait times. Very Professional medical people. They also did a good job with all the covid-19 restrictions

name: Laurence Gipson
text: I regard Dr. Charles Mosteller highly because of his experience and competence as an eye surgeon in Mobile, which testifies to his medical competence, and because he is a warm, friendly, responsive and capable person,

name: Clarice McCullough
text: Dr Mosteller is so nice Talks to you Explains everything ! His Nurse and staff is very friendly too !!

name: joy whatley
text: I really  appreciate Dr. Mostellar giving  me my eyesight back with no contacts and no glasses.  I have had these implants for several years and my eyes are 20,20 and no problems.

name: PHYLLIS GRAY
text: I met with Dr Mosteller for the first time yesterday.  I have already had multiple exams trying to get cataract surgery scheduled during COVID.  I already knew I needed the surgery,  and knew something about the options available.  Dr. Mosteller was wonderful about explaining in detail  the differences in options.  He asked what was important to me and that helped narrow my choices.    It was a long appointment because he answered all my various questions.  Of three drs, he was the only one to do this.  Instead of feeling like I was taking too much time, I felt respected as a person, this is a big decision in choosing a lens.  Personally, I felt completely confident that Dr. Mosteller is the perfect choice for my surgery.

name: Ron Allen
text: Outstanding doctor.  Highly recommend.  Great staff.

name: Don Coleman
text: Super efficient office.  Always seen on time and all staff super nice.  Totally recommend Dr. Mosteller.   He did cataract surgery and best thing I ever did with no pain at all.  :)))  No anxiety at all over cataract surgery on second eye.

name: leisa smith
text: Dr Mosteller is a very thorough and thoughtful doctor. He takes time to explain everything and answer any questions. You never feel rushed or that he is too busy to spend time with each patient. All of his staff are friendly and helpful. Great experience!

name: Lee McClinton
text: Dr Mostellar is an outstanding physician. I have been coming to him for years and the wait time has always been much much too long. My last visit was 3 hours and 45 minutes. My husband changed doctors because the wait is too long.

name: Mary Jane Blanchette
text: Dr. Mosteller was very thorough, pleasant and professional.

name: Alarider USA
text: Excellent medical care.

name: Francis baldwin
text: Dr. Mostellar has taken care of me and my wife for over 5 years. He is extraordinary and his practice is professional, thorough, kind, and always puts me first. I am very satisfied and thankful for him and his staff.

name: L.L. Lee
text: Staff and Dr. Mosteller friendly and knowledgeable. Very efficient visit with goals see to remedy problem.

name: Nancy Hardy
text: Dr. Mosteller is always professional and thorough and takes the time to explain any issues. I know I am always in the best hands with him and his staff. Stellar doctor!

name: Candace Anderson
text: Dr. C. Mosteller did my husband's cataracts, mine and eyelid surgery. He called after every surgery to check on us. All the staff were professional, caring and efficient. Extremely pleased!

name: Greg Seibert
text: Provided me with on call Saturday appt after eye injury.  Office corresponded after hours to make everything happen.  Cannot express how pleased I am with Dr Mosteller and the Premier staff.

name: Steve Finch
text:
I was a little upset when I hit home and discovered that they checked my eyesight with my glasses on.  They had changed my prescription on my previous visit and then checked my vision with those glasses and that prescription.  When I hit ti see the doctor, he said my eyesight was 20/20...  of course it was i I found out when I got home abs saw the my new script was a lot weaker than the previous script!  They checked it with my glasses on!

How do I fix this?

name: Judy Cross
text: Everything is great, I just wishared it didn't take  so long. It is a thorough exam, though and friendly, knowledgeable  staff.

name: Kathryn Griffin
text: I have been Dr. Mostellar’s patient for ten years and have always received excellent care for my eyes. He is so personable and professional and has accommodated my needs for treatment in a timely, efficient way.  I highly recommend him to everyone who wants excellent eye care.

name: Daniel
text: He is a great doctor and has the best staff that are very helpful with anything that you need.

I've found him and his staff to be unfailingly kind, courteous, efficient, and knowledgable about any problem I might have. name: Lacricia Core
text:
The doctor April Jones was amazing that’s where the two stars come from.

If you are considering purchasing eyeglasses from this location DON’T! I have received nothing but the runaround from this location. My vision is definitely not a priority to them. I’ve waited almost two months. Still no glasses after paying for the glasses on April 23. I will never order glasses from this location again. I will however continue to see the doctor there. None of this is her fault.

resp.text: Lacricia, I'm Cassie. I'm so glad you were happy with Dr. Jones, and so sorry about these issues with your glasses! This is definitely not the experience we want you to have. I'd like to look into how this happened -- could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: Brittany Hardman
text: I had a great experience. So it was no question where to take my daughter when she needed an exam. Everyone was friendly. The doctor was very thorough and professional. I love the fact it's all women it's empowering. Can't say enough great things about the place.

name: Mizzuz Mo
text: Dr.Jones and her staff are everything lovely and right with health care because eye health is vital. They are delightful and thorough from the front desk to the comprehensive exam. HOWEVER, the optician (glasses lady) refuses to give the pd number which is a measurement needed to order your own glasses online for cheaper. It's a part of your prescription/medical info and there's no part of your health information that you would not be able to obtain.

name: Richard Stephens
text: They were courteous and kind. More than willing to help. I needed to change my appointment to a sooner date and they got it done. Thank you for the pleasant experience!!

name: Jessica Jones
text: All the staff were very kind and helpful. We only had a short wait time, and Dr. Jones took her time with us and answered all of our questions. Great selection of glasses and all the staff made sure we had everything we needed. So glad we found this place.

name: Chris Cruz
text:
I am a Veteran that went through the VA. Dr. Jones did fine. Her staff has a bad attitude and are lazy. I couldn't get them to fax my prescription to the VA. Had to get the VA to call them. They also got attitude from Eyecare. Really sad how us vets get treated sometimes. Lived in this area over 40 years. Won't be back. Shame shame shame
Problem was resolved. Great job by the office manager.

resp.text: Chris, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry about the delay in faxing your prescription and the extra effort this caused. I'd like to look into how this happened -- could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com when you have a moment? Again, I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: Kenyetta Thomas
text: Dr. Jones was amazing. Definitely going to recommend her services to my family and friends. The promptness and professional care given by Dr. Jones did not go unnoticed. From the front desk to the exam room we received courteous and professional service. From this day on, we will be utilizing EyeCare associates.

text: This was a pleasant visit. I love going to an appointment and not having to sit their all day. The staff were great and Dr Jones was very friendly and professional. I would recommend Eye Associates to everyone.

text: Totally got my eye glass prescription wrong .didn't offer to correct it and over charged. Jennifer Alverson is the worst eye doctor I have ever went to. If you want it it done right please go elsewhere.

text: We've been using Dr. Alverson for as long as I can remember. My insurance changed once and I had to see another Dr. If that ever happens again I will just have to be a cash pay. She was also my wife's eye doctor long before we met and now she is our kids as well. There's not a better doctor around here.

text: The staff is very friendly and they worked great with my kids. I have a 4 year old and a 1 year old and they did amazing with them!

name: Amey and Ella Watts :P
text: Everyone is very friendly. Both my girls love to go there.

name: Dave Bolin
text: Always love your staff. Thanks for taking care of us!

name: donna benefield
text: The staff were all very friendly and did not to hurry me through the whole process/exam.

name: Donna Groat
text: Do not ever, EVER visit this Dr. overcharged me on first visit for eye infection and then wanted to charge me almost the same for the very next day for a follow up. No compassion, no understanding for folks on a budget! Steer clear of Jennifer Alverson!

text: Very kind and very thorough!!

resp.text: Christie, thanks for taking the time for a review!

name: Pam west
text: The staff is very helpful and professional but the Doctors are Very Incompetent! After 3 hours when there were no other patients, I left with the same prescription I had before and still not satisfied. I ask for another exam from another doctor ... Went in and never saw the doctor!! I saw a technician and left with the same prescription again!  Now I would have to pay for another exam somewhere else because of my insurance!  Oh and now I received a bill for $100 !!  I have such good vision insurance that I have never had to pay for eye exams except for copay. I did not even get my contacts or glasses there because they are so expensive!!!  Beware of this place!

name: zac mizell
text: Doctor touched me in weird ways

name: Scarlet M
text: Wonderful people and wonderful eye care! 😁

name: Kat Jones
text: Ridiculous!

resp.text: Kat, I'm Cassie. I'm so sorry to hear you had a bad experience in our office. I'd like to understand what happened; could you please email me at cassiegoodwin@eyecare-partners.com? Again -- I'm very sorry about this. I hope to hear from you soon.

name: Dee Michelle
text: Wouldn't go anywhere else :)

name: J J
text:
Dr. Young is excellent! We first took our daughter here when she was 2. We weren't sure where to go so our Pediatrician recommended Dr. Young. Dr. Young left our appointment to look up a case study because she was in a gray area of possibly needing glasses, but potentially growing out of the nearsightedness. From the study, we all agree that it would be best to try glasses and if she absolutely wouldn't wear them, then we would just recheck in a few months.

Our daughter loves her glasses and took to them immediately. Glasses were the right decision and something we can address early before she attends school. She is great about keeping them on! We bought them from the optical place at 20/20 and had them bend the ear pieces so that they fit comfortably around her ear instead of on top of them.

I also go to Dr. Young. I have Graves so keeping a close watch on my eyes is essential. I was very worried about eye bulging, but he calmed me down and said it isn't an issue right now and may never be since my disease is being managed. Whew!

name: Terry Margulis
text: Dr. Young was an eye consult for me at the hospital. He totally understood my issues and was very helpful to me. He also was very instrumental in helping me get assistance with specialty doctors quicker and it saved my life. I thank God for him!

name: Shirley Hancock
text: Dr Young is the only eye doctor I will ever go to. I love this place.

name: Dalishia Grimes
text: My mom went on several occasions and he was not very thorough at all. She went on 3 different occasions and he still was unable to get to the root of the issue. We are now seeing someone at UAB. I'd rather make that 1 1/2 drive then to go back to him.

name: General Rage
text: The absolute worst place to go for eye care. Imagine going to a place where the staff doesn't care and is matched by the Doctor. My entire family moved due to this, so if you're looking for a eye place keep looking.

name: James Dodds
text: Dr. Davis was horribly rude and unprofessional. Behavior was completely unacceptable. I would strongly discourage anyone from seeking his care.

name: Tom Sommerville
text: Very rude staff, went to pick up my glasses for a fitting, came to my car handed me my glasses in a $.50 cent pocket protector from CHINA. Did not adjust anything. I fixed my nose pads myself. Should have been treated better for a $750.00  pair of glasses

name: Amber Compton
text: I switched to this doctor's office since my old one no longer took my insurance. I'd only heard great things about the practice and I wasn't disappointed at all!  I've been going several years now for my routine eye exam and have always received great care and attention with each visit. Recently, I had a sudden onset allergy issue with one of my eyes one morning so I called when they opened and was able to be seen by lunch and didn't even have to wait forever in the waiting room. Top-notch, A+ service!

name: Sarah Flack
text: I scratched my eye and was in a lot of pain.  The office staff was caring, concerned, and made sure to get me taken care of quickly.  They worked me into the schedule the same day and I was very grateful for that speed and attention.  My eye is now healed and I have found a great new eye doctor.

name: EMMALYN CASTO
text: I was thoroughly impressed!  I woke up with my eye almost swollen shut, and called some other offices trying to get in on a Friday, then I tried this office, they were extremely courteous and offered to work me in later that morning.  When I arrived the girl was helpful getting my insurance cards sent from my mom.  The Doctor seemed very nice and very thorough.  I will be returning after this problem is all cleared up to get new contacts.  I would highly recommend Davis Eye Clinic

name: Dawn Bryant
text: I have used Davis eye clinic for years.   I wouldn't go or take my children anywhere else.  Anytime we've ever had any issues we have been seen promptly and issue addressed.   The staff took a huge amount of time teaching my son how to put in and take out his contacts. Dr bedsole is always professional and efficient.

name: Clay Davis
text: Davis Eye Clinic is one of those rare doctor's offices who actually reads your family medical history and noticed that glaucoma runs in my family and thus, has kept a close watch on my eye pressure ratings at each checkup and has kept me informed of any abnormalities.  Additionally, the staff are friendly and knowledgeable.

name: Sharon Smith
text:
If you can find a more professional, caring and knowledgable optometrist than Dr Stephanie Bedsole, my advice would be to use them.  Having been born with extremely poor vision, I have been seeing eye doctors since the age of 6 so I have seen MANY eye care professionals in my lifetime.  Dr. Bedsole is the consummate eye care professional and I am so thankful she is in Tuscaloosa.

Over the past 12 years she has treated my husband and me for regular exams as well as an unfortunate case of pink eye, severe dry eye,  identification of cataract,  loss of vision field, and diagnosis of under the eyelid infection.  This is in addition to the normal aging exams for the use of reading glasses, changes in prescriptions, etc.

I cannot say enough good things about Dr Bedsole as an optometrist and as a caring individual.  She follows up on her patients to make sure they are improving.  She has even accepted an off hours message from me when we had an eye related emergency and responded immediately. As I stated earlier, if you can find a better one - use them.  My bet is that there is not a better eye care professional in Tuscaloosa than Dr Bedsole.

name: Katelyn Mccary
text: Terrible, rude staff. The doctor fit me for new contacts despite me insisting that I had just been given an updated prescription by my eye doctor at home a few months prior. I also emphasized that I had 3 months' supply of contacts at home and was NOT looking to buy new ones. The doctor told me that was fine and that she would just write me a new prescription in case I wanted to update my lenses. This was after her asking me what my old prescription was and me telling her what I THOUGHT it was, emphasizing that I was pretty sure the prescription I had at home was much stronger than the numbers I could remember. Please keep in mind that I am young and inexperienced in the medical field and basically just moved through my appointment (which was supposed to only be a check-up on the blood vessels in my eyes) basically nodding along to whatever the doctor and the staff said because I know NOTHING about this stuff. When I get up to the front counter to pay they informed me that I owed $100 for the contact fitting that I DID NOT ASK FOR and that even the doctor explained to me wasn't entirely necessary because she told me I could one day use the updated prescription she wrote me if I wanted to. Ended up going home, letting my dad call them (because they would not listen to me at check out) and ultimately making my way back to the office for a refund of the $100. The entire time I'm there for the refund, an older lady who was not in any sort of medical attire (she looked like a patient) harassed me telling me I was not fit to drive with my old prescription, she could get me in trouble, etc. She stood over me badgering me while I removed the contacts that the doctor sent me home with and returned the prescription the doctor wrote me to her. The way I was treated by the staff here was absolutely ridiculous. Do not go here. Do not refer anymore UA students here. Btw, when I got home the prescription I had been written three months ago was the exact same as the one the doctor here wrote me. Go figure.

name: Leah Schultz
text: Refuse to share prescription with client and have had to jump through hoops to get my prescription faxed to a frames shop that is not them. The practitioners were very nice, but horrible communication within the office. Refuse to take office messages.

name: Heather Dumdey
text: Weve been going here for years only because Dr. Bedsole is wonderful. The front staff is so rude. The lady that sells the glasses is rude and pushy. We are finally switching Drs because I have just had enough after our most recent visit.

name: Brandi Wise
text: The young lady that initially checked me in and did part of the screening and Dr. Bledsoe were extremely sweet and comforting. Allison at the front desk will ruin your experience. She is extremely rude and has no business working with patients. I would NEVER employ someone in a healthcare position or any customer service position with her demeanor.

name: Joyce Turner
text: Dr Bedsole was really nice and good at her job the staff was well trained and nice but the minute Dr Davis came he was unprofessional  showed NO concern for my problem and no respect for my GP in my opinion  that is not the quality of a good Doctor and i refuse to allow him near my eyes

name: shauna echols
text: Super rude staff. I was given incorrect information over the phone, then treated like dirt for asking why I was told the wrong info. We walked out.

name: dan bojo
text: The doctor took time to address my problem, I was seen on time, no long wait!  The staff was friendly and helpful with my insurance questions.   Would highly recommend

name: Ginger Stone
text: Expensive but very down to earth and work with the patient to do what's right for their benifit & health.

name: C Porter
text: Good for the eye .

name: Stephanie Whatley Photo Music
text: Staff are super rude.

name: Sam Marquez
text: Great experience here. My vision is basically perfect at this point. Great doctor, service, very professional. Would recommend!

name: Bill
text: Great experience from the initial consultation, surgery, and follow-up exams. Personable care which you may not find at the larger Lasik chains. Pro tip...tie your post op discs together with a shoelace. Easier and more comfortable than tape.

name: Joanna Bishop
text:
I was very impressed by the professional service and care. They took the time to thoroughly explain the LASIK procedure, recovery, care and expected results beforehand.  Dr. Jennifer Michelson also walked me through each step during the painless procedure which put me at ease.  The surgery took less than 15 minutes, and the downtime was minimal.

I highly recommend them!  I'm enjoying my improved vision without contacts and glasses!

name: Kristin Hankey
text: I just had Laser Eye Surgery recently & I couldn't be more happier with my results. Dr. Michelson & the entire staff were extremely helpful & friendly. It goes a long way when you have the "Best" Eye Doctor & staff in the state of Alabama. 5 STARS from one happy patient!

name: john underwood
text:
I was blind, but now I see!

What a life-changing experience. Everyone was extremely knowledgeable about the LASIK procedure and gave multiple tips and suggestions for before, during, and after the surgery. Also, do not let me forget to mention the beautiful women of Michelson Laser Vision. Mandy and Laren are easy on the eyes (pun intended) as well as amazingly helpful and professional. I would recommend Michelson Laser Vision to ANYONE looking to see the world in a new way!

name: Kyle Lynch
text: I had a very good experience getting my corrective surgery here. I received PRK surgery rather than Lasik because of my dry eyes, and Jennifer and the nurses/staff did such a wonderful job. I definitely recommend you get your procedure here.

name: Sarah White
text: I had previously accompanied my husband to his eye appointment at this office and witnessed a very warm and welcoming environment. This is what led me to decide on having my own eyes taken care of here. My experience has been excellent. Everybody was friendly and made me feel well cared for. The process was thoroughly explained to me in a way that I could easily understand. The procedure was completed with swift precision. I am very happy with my results. I highly recommend Michelson Laser Vision to all of my friends, family, and anyone in need of corrective eye surgery.

name: jim myers
text: Was very, very pleased with the entire staff and Dr. Jennifer.  Very professional, very thorough and presented me with very clear options as to improving my vision.  I would highly recommend you schedule an appointment with these folks if you are considering laser vision surgery or for an eye exam in general.  Great experience.  An 11 on a scale of 10!

name: Lana Robinson
text: I’ve worn glasses since the 2nd grade and, at the age of 50, decided it was time to look into laser vision correction because my eyesight was getting progressively worse. I hadn’t been able to wear contacts for 10 years due to some previous eye problems, and I had really dry eyes. I selected Michelson Laser Vision because he is well-known and respected in laser vision correction. Dr. Marc Michelson spent a lot of time with me before the surgery evaluating the best way to proceed and explained the process and what I could expect after surgery. The surgery was over quickly, and I could see at great distances for the first time in my life! Over the next few days, my vision improved drastically. It’s now been 9 months since my surgery and I can honestly say that having laser surgery on my eyes is the best decision I’ve made! The entire staff is invested in making sure you have a great experience and great eyesight! I feel like I’ve gotten a part of my life back.

name: Josh Kelley
text:
Dr. Michelson and her staff are the definition of professional and efficient. Don’t go see them expecting to spend the day. They have this down to a science. You will be in and out in the blink of an eye(see what I did there??). They are not only fast they are precise. Their dedication to excellence shines through the entire procedure. From the screening to the scheduling to the pre op and the post op. This crews knows what they are doing and is second to none. I’m kicking myself for not doing this sooner.

As far as the actual procedure goes, imagine walking into a room without being able to see anything and then 15 minutes later you can read the clock on the wall!! That’s literally the exact experience I had. I can’t recommend them enough. Don’t tell them I said this but knowing what I know now, I would have paid double.

name: Bryan Knox
text: Top notch professional service and care. Put me completely at ease and thoroughly explained the procedure, care, recovery and expected results. I highly recommend them and would do it again!

name: Leah Gentry
text: So thankful for my  PRK laser surgery. Dr. Michelson and his staff are awesome! Have the perfect vision i have always wanted! Great experience!

name: Jake Campbell
text: I Can See! I was legally blind and now I can see!  No Pain, Very Professional and phenomenal follow up!

name: Brad Milner
text: Loved Mr. Michelson.  He put me at ease.  I can see again!!!

name: Rachel Johns
text: I had thought about having a vision correction procedure for many years. When I finally built up enough courage to do it, I saw Jennifer Michelson MD and her team. Dr. Michelson and her team were very thorough. I ended up having PRK due to some abnormal scans. However, Dr. Michelson did several evaluations over a few months before making the recommendation for PRK instead of the LASIK. She did a wonderful job explaining the procedure, differences, and risks/benefits of each. She even came in to clinic on a Sunday to see me after surgery. From the time you check in to the time you check out, you will encounter happy smiling faces. I enjoyed my experience. I now can see 20/15 without any corrective lenses. I would highly recommend anyone to Dr. Michelson and her team.

name: Rod Epperson
text: Awesome staff ....Dr Michaelson is great I had lasic In march they did very extensive eye exams to get the right correction for my procedure ..  After my procedure I went home took a 2 HR nap and when I awoke my world had changed i could read small print i could see far away it was amazing everything looked so crisp..  By far the best money i have ever spent in my life...  It took me about 2 weeks to get out of the habit of reaching for glasses every time I got ready to read something..   Its been 8 months and life is great

name: Rivera Wheeler
text: Dr. Marc Michelson and his staff are excellent and very professional and show care in their patients. I just had my Lasik Surgery done this past Wednesday morning and it was definitely a great procedure and the work was professional and handled with delicate care. I saw perfect vision the following day and now I’m seeing my best vision I’ve ever had living on this earth. I’m going to say this and it’s not me being overrating but Dr. Marc Michelson is the best doctor for the Lasik Surgery in the state of Alabama. I came all the way from Mobile,Al from start to finish and it was worth the time and efforts I put into investing in having the best doctor to preform the surgery and caring his staff gave me. Trust me you won’t be disappointed. I’d give 100 stars but Google won’t let me. Thanks Dr Marc Michelson and your professional caring staff. Don’t put it off if you seeking Lasik Surgery he is the answer.

name: Mark Anderson
text: Great staff! Very well organized operation.

name: Greg Doss
text: I have worn glasses for many years with terrible distance vision. I had LASIK and now my only regret is that I just wish I would have done it so much sooner! I went from 20/200 uncorrected vision to 20/25 day one post op! Both Dr Marc Michelson and Dr Jennifer Michelson were great, along with the staff! Definitely the place to go and doo ok it sooner rather than later!

name: Nadine Jones
text: I love me some Dr. Michelson.  He is professional and an excellent physician.  His staff is awesome.  I can see! I had LASIK surgery a week ago.  I can see things that I have not seen without glasses in years.  If I could give them 10 stars I would.  Hurry and schedule your appointment.

name: Madison Damazio
text: I got lasik about a month ago and I am so pleased with my results! Dr. Michelson & Mandy made time to talk to me every time I visited the office and addressed my concerns about the standard symptoms after the procedure. I 100% recommend them for lasik!

name: Will White
text: Dr. Michelson performed LASIK on my 18 year old son.  Within 48 hours, he went from horrible eyesight to 20/20 or better and had a great recovery.  Well worth the investment. I highly recommend.

name: Tasha Nunnelley

They talked me through every step of the procedure, and while the procedure was being done,  Dr. Michelson and his team kept me comfortable while talking to me every step of the way.  I'm so glad I had this procedure done, and by Michelson's wonderful team!

text: I had an excellent experience with everyone in this practice. I saw Dr. Jennifer Michelson for my pre-op appointments and she performed my lasik surgery. text: My wife and I had  lasix surgery with Dr. Jennifer Michelson about a year ago and it was the best decision we have made regarding our vision. We both have 15/20 vision and have had no complications. All of the staff there is great and I highly recommend them.

name: C D
text: I have been leery regarding lasik surgery for several years.  A colleague of mine recommended Dr Michelson and I am forever grateful. The procedure was quick and with almost no discomfort. Dr Michelson is very thorough and comes with years of experience. In fact, Dr Michelson is one the first physicians internationally that has performed lasik. I am a 42yo medical provider and the procedure was worth every penny. I love waking up and walking around without glasses or contacts. Thanks Dr Michelson.

text: They have the process down to a science and I now live life without glasses. The staff is friendly and the price given is exactly what I paid including all follow up visits. I would use them again.

These people are miracle workers!!
I had PRK preformed on my eyes and I am seeing things like never before. Please consider this if you are like me and tired of wearing lenses on your face or plastic in your eyes. This is truly life changing and it's just freaking awesome! I had PRK  a week ago and can see perfect.

text: Had my Lasik surgery with Dr. Michelson on 3/28 and I am seeing perfectly!  The procedure was so quick and easy.  The staff at Michelson Laser Vision are all so friendly and welcoming. name: Marcus Castro
text: I have thought about getting Lasik for years...I finally decided to move forward with it. I am so glad that I did and so happy that I chose Dr. Michelson. He did a fantastic job. 20/15 vision! I would recommended him 10 out of 10!

name: Faraaz Salik
text: Wonderful practice here in Alabama. Dr. Michelson was incredible. Answered all of my questions and reassured me the entire way. He schedule me immediately, within 2 weeks of my initial consultation. The entire staff is incredible and friendly as well. 10/10 would recommend.

name: Brittany King
text: Dr. Jennifer Michelson performed my surgery.  I actually came to Michelson Laser Vision because of a scheduling conflict that I had with Schaeffer.  I was so disappointed and made the last minute decision to change doctors.  I could not be more happy with the professionalism and true kindness of the staff.  I honestly was so nervous and had waited years to be able to afford this surgery.  I never felt any pain with the laser and Jennifer took so much care with me knowing how nervous I was.  The staff stayed right there with me and they did the countdown for surgery of while I was under the laser.  Everything about this experience has been so positive.  Simple things like being able to see even in the shower is just such a blessing and a quality of life thing for me.  I never realized how much I didn't see even with corrective glasses.  I could cry over my results because I'm so thankful for the results.  I do experience driving at night a halo effect on lights but honestly its not bad enough to effect my driving and the other benefit of seeing in general outweighs this one not so ideal part of laser correction.   I highly recommend anyone to come see this practice.  This surgery was worth every penny to me.

name: Lamar Riley
text: Last week Dr. Marc Michelson changed my life. I am so thankful to him and his entire staff. Everyone is very knowledgeable and so friendly. It made making the decision to have LASIK surgery an easy one. After being dependent on glasses or contacts for the last 35 plus years, I can now wake up every morning and be able to see the alarm clock without reaching for glasses. To say I am thrilled with the results is an understatement.  If you have ever thought about corrective eye surgery, Michelson Laser Vision is the only place to go.

They will put you at ease, if i can do it... you can too.

text: Just had lasik yesterday, was back at work this morning at 6am. name: Trent Sandlin
text: Dr. Michelson did an amazing job performing LASIK surgery on my eyes. When I visited the next day I had 20/15 vision. He was willing to take the time to answer any questions I had. Overall he is a great doctor as well as a great guy.

name: L H
text: Dr. Michelson was wonderful and the staff is great. The team was very knowledgeable and professional. I had an awesome experience and would recommend Michelson Laser Vision to family and friends.

name: Drew White
text: You get what you pay for! I had PRK and at my 3 month check up I am 20/15. The staff is amazing. They are friendly, courteous, and make sure you are well informed through the whole process. I am a pansy when it comes to eyes. I could never wear contacts because I shiver at the thought of touching my eye ball. The procedure was painless and recovery was not as bad as I anticipated. I was properly educated that PRK is a longer healing process and to expect to go from clear vision, to blurry, and back to clear. Everything I was told would happen did. I made sure to follow the prescriptions and eye care as directed. If you wear glasses you know the pains of wanting to watch TV in bed bit making sure to not fall asleep with your glasses on. Or going from one extreme temperature to another and your glasses fogging up. Having to pay extra for prescription sun glasses or dealing with horrible transition lenses. Getting this done has been the best decision for my health. Again, I cannot praise Dr. Michelson and his staff enough. I am more than pleased with my results.

name: Sam Douglas
text: Very professional. Quick Office visit. Great results, -6.25 to 20/15 Vision in both eyes. Very much appreciated that Dr. Michelson himself called in the evening after the surgery to check on me and make sure that everything was okay. Don't know many other surgeons that would do that. As a surgeon myself it was very important to go to the best, and I feel that I did. Would definitely recommend anyone considering Lasix or PRK.

name: Angie Hartman
text: Seeing perfectly on post-op day one!!  I highly recommend Dr. Michelson and his team.  They did an excellent job answering questions and making the LASIK procedure very comfortable.  Honestly, the most difficult part of the whole process was parking at UAB highlands!!  I wouldn’t hesitate to recommend Dr. Michelson...  My only regret is not having the procedure done earlier!

name: Mazy Holiday
text: 2 hour and 10 minutes wait (for second surgery because the first was unsuccessful), and Michelson never bothered to even come in and discuss. Designated drive not aloud to leave facility for entire stay - it's an eyeball, not a black-market kidney. Clearly Michelson's time is extraordinary (self) important, much more so than his patients.

resp.text: Ms. Holiday, We at Michelson Laser Vision strive for the best in customer service and care for each of our patients. Since your comments here reflect a service level that we are not known for adhering to, we would very much appreciate an opportunity to assist you in achieving a better customer service standard by calling our office and speaking directly to our Refractive Coordinator, Audriano at 205-969-8100, who will be happy to discuss your experience and concerns with you personally. Again, thank you for writing to us to express your thoughts about your visit as it is our office policy to strive to be the very best in our patients' eyes.

name: Prudence Kauffman
text: Amazing Doctors and staff, highly recommend them!  Did cataract surgery on both my eyes and had wonderful results.

name: Crystal Roberts
text:
ONE OF MY BEST DECISIONS Contacts or glasses have been a daily chore in my life for 17+ years. I began my LASIK search with another eye care provider. It did not occur to me that I would be rejected as a candidate, until the optometrist (not surgeon) noted a callus due to chronic contact use and subsequently rejected me. Thankfully my husband suggested Michelson where the doctor that would be performing surgery approved me. Dr. Michelson’s years of experience and expertise allowed him to see the callus was not a structural part of my eye and would not prohibit my benefiting from LASIK. Having a one on one with Dr. Michelson prior to the day of surgery was invaluable for me. The staff was very attentive and I felt as though I was in the care of a very competent work family. I felt informed and reassured throughout the process including during the surgery itself. No more foggy glasses, no more keeping a contact schedule or burning scratchy contacts. I would definitely recommend investing in a better quality of life through Michelson Laser.
Thanks to Michelson Laser my vision improved from relying on a -6.5 prescription to 20/15 in less than 24 hours!

name: Rachel Dunaway
text: In June, I had LASIK surgery, and I am so pleased with my results! I went from 20/800 vision to 20/15 vision! Although, I had halos and starbursts at night at first, they have gotten so much better as my eyes have healed. I am 100% satisfied with Dr. Michelson, his amazing staff, and the surgery overall. He and his staff answered every question I had and addressed every concern I had in a professional and confident way prior to my surgery. On the day of the surgery, they completely put me at ease. Then the night after the surgery, Dr. Michelson personally called and checked on me. That meant a lot to me and spoke volumes to me about how important his patients are to him. Overall, the entire experience was a blessing! Thank you!

name: Murphy Sealy
text: I was referred here for lasik  by my eye doctor. I had a great experience with the staff and doctor. My results were better than I could have ever imagined.

text: I highly recommend Dr. Marc Michelson for LASIK. I had the PRK and I am very pleased with the outcome. name: Bridget Smith
text: After wearing contacts for 25 years, my eyes became sensitive to them if worn for more than a few hours. I hated glasses, always felt dizzy in them and couldn't handle the loss of my peripheral vision. I decided to visit Dr. Michelson to see if I was a canadiate for Lasik surgery. Yesterday was my surgery and today, at my post-op appointment, I could read the letters on the 20/15 line! My prescription was a -5 in both eyes, I couldn't see letters on the tv 2 feet from me before. I've heard from numerous people this surgery was life changing for them, I now believe it! It feels like a miracle.

name: Jordan Stanley
text: Great experience. Nurses and doctor are all wonderful. 20/15 corrected vision!

name: Debbie Hagan
text: After wearing contacts for over 30 years, I decided to try Lasik surgery.  I am so grateful to Dr. Michelson and their staff for my overall experience. Very professional and caring!  My vision is now 20/15 and I can see much better than I ever did with contacts!  My only regret ... I didn't go see Dr. Michelson sooner!  If you are considering Lasik surgery, please, go see Dr. Michelson!

name: jvicambro
text:
I am a young professional (surgeon) who just moved to the Birmingham area and decided to have lasik done before starting my job.  My main sources I used to decide who would do my surgery included asking people around town, browsing the the internet and ultimately the very positive reviews I read online from former patients.  I, too, am very satisfied I chose Dr. Michelson.

As I write this review, I am post-op day 1 and have minimal pain.  I was tested today and have 20/15 vision in my R and 20/20 vision in my L eye.  Needless to say, I am happy with my results just one day out from surgery and look forward to not relying on contacts or glasses anymore.  I was very impressed with how professional everyone was at Dr. Michelson's office.  Everything was explained to me in detail and all questions were answered to my satisfaction.

name: Gavin Mikell
text: It’s a Miracle! I can see again! The staff is amazing here!! Recommend to everyone!

name: Jessica Bou Akar
text: Very satisfied with my experience with this awesome group! By far the best place to get LASIK!

name: Tyler Elliott
text: It has been just over 24 hours from my surgery. I'm already seeing 20/20 and made it back to work the day after surgery. I am extremely pleased with the results. The amount of time the doctors and staff spent before my surgery going over every detail made me feel very comfortable. They were friendly, professional, and the results are phenomenal. My only regret is not doing this sooner. I contemplated LASIK 10 years ago, but backed out after feeling uncomfortable with the doctor who was going to perform the surgery. I had a completely different experience this time with Michelson Laser Vision which is what led me to go through with it. Everything went exactly how they described it to me in the pre-op exam. I highly recommend them to anyone who wants to have LASIK!

name: Anna Khan
text: I had a great experience with Dr. Michelson! I was really worried about getting laser corrective surgery, because I knew I would probably have to get PRK which  is supposed to have a long recovery time,, but my vision was practically perfect a week after my PRK surgery. The surgery itself was quick, and the recovery was a lot shorter than other experiences of PRK that I've heard of. I went from about a 20/300 to 20/15 vision. Dr. Michelson is great, and I would recommend him to anyone thinking about laser eye surgery.

name: Yvonne Hardy
text: I had my surgery yesterday for Lasik!!!  As of today I have 20/15 vision.  The staff and Dr. Michelson were very friendly and explained everything precisely!!!!  I have been wearing contacts and glasses for over 10 yrs!!!   Now I'm free of glasses and contacts!!

name: Catherine Grizzard
text: Having your eyes lasered is not something you go into lightly, so I decided I would consult with two different practices before picking a doctor.  I left the first office with a piece of paper that listed the price of the surgery.  I left Dr. Michelson's office with a folder full of valuable information, including statistics regarding the successful outcomes of his LASIK patients' vision.  While the price wasn't cheaper, I knew this was the doctor/staff that I wanted to operate on my eyes.  The surgery itself was just as amazing as the results.  The operation was completely pain free. The ride home was painful, but I took my Ambien and went to sleep as soon as I got home. After my four hour Ambien nap, I woke up completely pain free and have had no pain since.  I went back the morning after surgery for my post-op and had 20/20 vision.  I'm now eleven days post op and still getting used to the fact that I no longer have to depend on glasses or contacts after using them for 23 years.  I'm so glad I went with Michelson!

name: Tony Maske
text: My Lasik procedure went flawlessly and Dr. Michelson and his staff went above and beyond in every aspect. I wouldn't hesitate to recommend these guys for anyone thinking about Lasik.

name: Ava Burt
text: Staff is excellent and the experience is amazing! So glad I chose Dr. Michaelson. The #1 lasik Dr. in Alabama.

name: S. Harrison
text: I had LASIK done on both of my eyes about a week ago and went from being VERY near sighted (-5.00) to 20/20 vision :). Everyone was very friendly and Dr. Michelson did a great job!!

name: Tristin Terry
text: Had Lasik here a while back. They had to do it twice, and my left eye is still not 20-20.

name: India Collins
text: In the back of my mind, I had always thought about finding out more about lasik surgery and always said to people " I would love to have lasik one day".  I could kick myself for not having lasik done sooner! I am 51 years old and as I have gotten older, I began having more trouble with wearing contacts.  I could only wear them for a few hours before they would cause my eyes to get very dry, red and irritated.  Because of this, I reverted back to wearing glasses which I really didn't want to have to do but felt like I had no choice.  I was near-sighted, which meant that I had no significant problems seeing up close, but couldn't see things very clearly at a distance. About 15 years earlier, a supervisor of mine had lasik and mentioned that he had done an extensive amount of research on it and would be having Dr. Michelson perform his surgery. I kept Dr. Michelson's name tucked away in my memory and said that if I ever had it done, he would be the one that would do it.  I made the call to Michelson Laser Vision and couldn't get over how easily it all fell together after that call.  I went to my first appoinment and had several super-quick tests to see if I could actually qualify for lasik.  Margaret and Lauren ran the tests, then Margaret sat down with me and  told me that I qualified for the procedure. They were both great about taking the time to explain the tests and what to expect on the day of the surgery.  I was so excited to hear this news because my eyesight was so bad in one eye and I also have a history of diabetes in my family which I thought would completely rule me out for the surgery. Dr. Michelson asked me if  his daughter,Jennifer Michelson, M.D., who is also a practicing opthalmologist/cataract and laser eye surgeon there at the clinic,could perform the lasik surgery under his supervision. She has done many, many of these surgeries  and is very well qualified just as her father. I agreed, came in a few days later and had the procedure done  which only took about one minute to perform and I was in the office for about an hour total.  There was absolutely no pain involved and I didn't have any trouble whatsoever after the surgery.  The next day I was seeing perfectly with 20/15 vision in my eye that had before not been able to make out huge letters on the eye chart! I was sold! I drove to my appointment that very morning after surgery and  was driving and taking kids to cross-country practice that day as well. To be able to see so clearly things like car tag numbers, street signs and other things at a distance without the use of any kind of corrective lenses was so incredible! If you have ever thought about having this procedure you won't regret it.  It is truly a life-changing experience!
